GSP33nysu__1u:6: yena prādurabhāvi bhūmivalaye vyastāri gosantatiḥ prābodhi śrutipaṅkajaṃ karuṇayā prākāśi tattvaṃ param /
GSP33nysu__1u:7: dhvāntaṃ dhvaṃsamanāyi sādhunikaraścākāri sanmārgagastena vyāsadivākareṇa satataṃ mā tyāji me mānasam // 2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:8: vyāptiryasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sapakṣe sthitirvyāvṛttiśca vipakṣato 'tha viṣaye saktinar vai bādhite /
GSP33nysu__1u:9: naivāsti pratipakṣayuktiratulaṃ śuddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ sa me bhūyāttattvavinirṇayāya bhagavānānandatīrtho muniḥ // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12: sakalavacanaceto devatā bhāratī sā mama vacasi nidhattāṃ sannidhiṃ mānase ca // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:19: na śabdābdhau gāḍhā naca nigamacarcāsu caturā naca nyāye prauḍhā naca viditavedyā api vayam
GSP33nysu__1u:20: paraṃ śrīmatpūrṇapramatigurukāruṇyasaraṇiṃ prapannā mānyāḥ smaḥ kimapi ca vadanto 'pi mahatām bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena prāṇināṃ niḥśreyasāya praṇītamapi brahmamīmāṃsāśāstramasādhunibandhāndhatamasāvakuṇṭhitatvenāpraṇītamiva manyamāno bhagavānānandatīrthamuniryathā'cāryābhiprāyaṃ asya bhāṣyaṃ vidhāyānubhāṣyamapi kariṣyanvilīnaprakṛtitayā svayamantarāyavidhuro
GSP33nysu__1u:21: 'pyanavaratamīśvarapravaṇakāyakaraṇavṛttirapi nārāyaṇapraṇāmādikaṃ prāripsitasyānantarāyaparisamāpteḥ pracayasya ca hetutayāvigītaśiṣyācāraparamparādināvagatamavaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ śiṣyān grāhayituṃ granthādau nibadhnāti- nārāyaṇamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:23: asyodbhavādidamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyaṃ sadā priyatamaṃ mama sannamāmi //
GSP33nysu__1u:28: nikhiletyādīnāṃ tu pramāṇakarmaṇā nārāyaṇena viśeṣaṇatayā sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:36: viśiṣṭate vastvebhiriti viśeṣā asādhāraṇadharmā aśeṣāśca te viśeṣāśca /
GSP33nysu__1u:38: yāvanto vandyatvanimittabhūtā dharmāḥ tebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'pi hetubhyo vandyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:52: nikhilā niḥśeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekamapyanavadhikā guṇā ānandādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:54: ta eva deho yasya na punaḥ prākṛtādiriti tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:56: asya pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhatayā buddhisannihitasya svavyatiriktaprapañcasyodbhava utpattirādirasyetyudbhavādi janmādyaṣṭakaṃ tadyathāsambhavaṃ dadātītyudbhavādidastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:63: apauruṣeyatvena tanmūlatvena vānāśaṅkitadoṣatvādinā śobhanāni vākyāni vedādīni brahmasūtrādīni ca suvākyāni tairakhilairāpyatamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:65: yadi vyācikhyāsitena brahmamīmāṃsāśāstreṇa tannirṇetavyārthena vedādinā ca pratipādya iti nārāyaṇo vandanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:66: hanta tarhi tata eva dharmādikaṃ prāṇādikaṃ vā vandanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:76: na cāntareṇa lakṣaṇaṃ vastunirdhāraṇamityato vibhavādanekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇānyanenocyante
GSP33nysu__1u:77: tatra nikhiletyanena nikhilaguṇatvaṃ pūrṇaguṇatvaṃ svato guṇaikadehatvaṃ ceti vipakṣābhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇānyuditāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:87: nikhiletyādyuktalakṣaṇopapannatayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavya ityataḥ suvākyairāpyamityuktam
GSP33nysu__1u:105: athavā nāyaṃ nārāyaṇaśabdo ḍitthādiśabda iva bhagavati sāṅgetiko ghaṭādiśabda iva vā rūḍhimātrapravṛttaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:116: tṛtīyasūtreṇa tatra śāstraṃ pramāṇamabhidhāya tasyādhyāyaśeṣeṇa tadviṣayatopapāditā /
GSP33nysu__1u:122: viśeṣato me paramākhyavidyāvyākhyāṃ karomyanvapi cāhameva // MAnuv_1,1.2
GSP33nysu__1u:126: anvapi punarapi praṇamya bhaktayādyupetatālakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvāhaṃ paramākhyavidyāyā brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrarūpāyā vyākhyāṃ karomīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:131: bhāve vā pūrvaśloka eva bahuśaḥ sannamāmīti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:138: yo hi yacchāstre pravartate tasya tatprabhāvo gururiti prasiddhameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:141: jagata etacchāstrapravaktṛṇāṃ brahmādīnāmañjasā mukhyatayā na tu vayo
GSP33nysu__1u:144: prakārāntareṇa gurutvaṃ nārāyaṇasya samarthayate- viśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:146: viśeṣata iti sākṣādupadeṣyṛtvena na tu jagata iva paramparayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:147: atra yadi śāstraprabhavamityādyevocyeta tadā pṛthakpraṇāmena devatāyā gurośca pārthakyaśaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:173: asti tāvadasmingranthe”dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca'; ityādau paravidyākhyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:183: tathāpi svapraṇītabhāṣyeṇaiva kṛtavyutpādanamidaṃ śāstramiti kimanena vyutpādanenetyato 'nvapi cetyāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:192: yaduktaṃ nārāyaṇo 'sya śāstrasya prabhava iti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:198: paraśabdasyānekārthatvena vidyāśabdasya cārthavivakṣāvirahiṇyapi mantre prayogadarśanena paravidyākhyāyāḥ sarvottamaprāmāṇyāniścāyakatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:201: atra kṛtakṛtyo 'pi harirātmakṛpāspadairviriñcabhavapūrvakairamarairarthito vyāsaḥ prādurbhūto na tu jāto granthamimaṃ cakra ityanena nārāyaṇasya śāstraprabhavatve 'nupapattiḥ parihṛtā dṛśyante hi kevalaṃ kṛpāpāravaśyena paropakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarāṃ tairarthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:202: ata eva paraprayojanamapyātmagāmīva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstrapraṇayanamiti jñāpayitumātmanepadaprayogaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:204: paravidyākhyayā asya sarvottamaprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ vyutpādayituṃ paravidyākhyamityanūdyānuttamaṃ śāstramiti vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__1u:208: “dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca'; iti vidyādvayamuddiśya tatrāparetyādinā sāṅgānvedānaparavidyātvenoktavā”atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate'; iti paravidyā pradarśitā /
GSP33nysu__1u:214: tadyathā paramadhārmika ityabhihite paramatvaṃ dharmeṇeti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:229: tā eva paramā vidyā yadā viṣṇostu vācakāḥ'; iti bhagavatpādīyaṃ vyākhyānamapyetamevārthaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:230: brahmamīmāṃsāśāstravyutpāditanyāyānupakṛtā hi vedādayo viṣṇoravācakāstadukṛtāśca tasya vācakā bhavantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:231: tathāpi kevalasya na paravidyātvaṃ labhyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:237: evaṃ tāvadāgamenāsya śāstrasyānuttamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhyādhunānumānato 'pi tat siṣādhayiṣurādau tāvatprāmāṇyamātre anumānaṃ vaktumāha- gururiti
GSP33nysu__1u:238: yato yatkāraṇaṃ bādarāyaṇo gurūṇāṃ jagatastattvopadeśakānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ gururupadeṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:239: yataśca śāstrāṇāṃ vedānāṃ bhāratādīnāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ prabhavo gurūṇāmaśeṣārthapratipādakānāṃ savistarāṇāṃ vedādiśāstrāṇāṃ gururmukhyaprabhavo na tu sampradāyamātrapravartaka iti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:241: taduditaṃ tena bādarāyaṇenopadiṣyamidaṃ śāstramato mānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:243: atra gururgurūṇāmityādihetūnāṃ vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgānāmānukūlyānyeva sākṣātsādhyāni mānasīti tu paramasādhyanirdeśa iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:245: vivakṣitārthatattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ vivakṣā ceti trayaṃ vakturānukūlyaṃ nāma /
GSP33nysu__1u:248: tatra gurūṇāṃ gururiti vakturbādarāyaṇasya vivakṣitārthatattvajñānasādhane hetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:249: yo hi yasya tattvopadeṣyā sa tato 'dhikatattvajñānavānupalabdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:250: ayaṃ ca sarvajñakalpānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ tattvopadeṣyā brahmarudrādideveṣvityādyāgamādavagataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:252: gurūṇāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ guruḥ prabhava ityanenāpi tattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ ca sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:253: yo hi yāvadatharpratipādakasyāgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantamarthaṃ tattvato jānannavagataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:257: yaśca bahorāgamasya prabhavaḥ so 'sati nimittāntare paṭukaraṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:258: ayaṃ cāparasya vedādeḥ prabhavaḥ kathamapaṭukaraṇo bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:261: nahi svayaṃ tattvajñānāyogyaḥ pareṣāṃ tattvopadeṣyā dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:267: nanvatra gururgurūṇāmityādīnāṃ śāstraprāmāṇyena yathāśruta eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo vyākhyāyatām
GSP33nysu__1u:272: yadyapi caite pratyekaṃ bauddhāgamādau mānatāṃ vyabhicaranti /
GSP33nysu__1u:277: evaṃ tarhi bhāratādipraṇayanaviśiṣṭena teṣāmapraṇītatvādbādarāyaṇena brahmādīnprati tanmokṣārtamupadiṣṭatvamātraṃ hetuḥ syāditi cedbāḍham /
GSP33nysu__1u:279: tathā sati gururgurūṇāṃ prabhavaḥ śāstrāṇāmiti vyarthamāpadyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:297: naca pratyakṣādau satyapi prāmāṇye nāstyāptavākyatvamiti sādhyāvyāpakatvānnāyamupādhiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:301: saṃmatatve vā sādhanāvacchinne pauruṣeyavākyatvāvacchinne vā sādhye
GSP33nysu__1u:307: api tarhyanukūlavaktrādimattvasyāptavākyatayā vyāptatvāttena tāṃ prasādhya tayā prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sādhyata ityāśayavānāha- vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti
GSP33nysu__1u:311: tena siddhayā'ptavākyatayā mānamidaṃ śāstramiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:324: pramāṇena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ tathā vādīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:343: evaṃ sati yo yatraivambhūtaḥ sa tatrāpta ityuktaṃ syāditi cedastu ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:347: yo yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyaṃ dhanaṃ arhatītyādau sārvatrikavyavahārahetutopalambhāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:350: yathā cānanugatasyāpi nāvyāptiḥ sārvatrikavyavahārahetutā ca tathā sāmānyaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:352: etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vakteti lakṣaṇadvayamapi samāhitaṃ veditavyam
GSP33nysu__1u:355: vipralipsā ca śrotṛprasaṅgānukūlataikanibandhanā tadabhāve nivartata iti vaktrādyānukūlyavattāyā āptavākyatayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:357: nahi nāṭakādiprabandhaṃ viracayannapi kadāciduktalakṣaṇopapanno na bhavati bhavabhūtiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:369: anukūlavaktrādimattayā āptavākyatāsādhane vaktrānukūlyasyāptyekadeśatvena sādhyāviśiṣṭatā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:370: vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti vākyaṃ tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhanavyāpakatāpradarśanārthaṃ bhaviṣyati
GSP33nysu__1u:374: nahi upādhiṃ dūṣayatā sādhanavyāpakatāṃ vyutpādya sādhanenopādheḥ pakṣe sādhanaṃ vidhāya tena sādhyaṃ sādhanīyamiti kuladharmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:375: upādheḥ sādhanābhedaṃ pradarśya tena sādhyaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:383: anyathā yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo 'pi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:386: yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vaktā āpta ityāśritaṃ tadā sādhyaviśiṣṭatāyāḥ śaṅkaiva nāsti
GSP33nysu__1u:390: anyathāstu vaktrādyānukūlyaṃ vakturvipralipsāmūlatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ ca bhavatvityāśaṅkāyāḥ ko nivārayitā /
GSP33nysu__1u:391: yadyapi prāmāṇyaṃ svata eveti bādarāyaṇīyaṃ matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:396: evaṃ vijātīyasaṃvādenāsya śāstrasya prāmāṇyamupapādya tadanuttamatāsiddhaye sajātīyadvayasaṃvādamapyāha- śrutīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:399: yathā āptavākyatayā tathā śrutimūlatayāpītyupamārtho vā tathāśabdaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:401: tathāpyatra sāmānārthatāsāmyena gaupyā vṛttyā śrutiyuktisaṃvāditārthau vyākhyeyau /
GSP33nysu__1u:427: brahma vedastadarthaḥ parabrahma vā tasya sūtrāṇi brahmasūtrāṇi /
GSP33nysu__1u:428: sakalavedārthabhūtasya parabrahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ svarūpanirṇayārthāni sūtrāṇīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:430: etenaitacchāstravācinaḥ śārīrakaśabdasya śarīrameva śarīrakaṃ tatra bhavaḥ śārīrako jīvaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:431: tamadhikṛtya kṛto 'yaṃ granthaḥ śārīraka iti vyākhyānaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:433: tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyabrahmarūpatā mīmāṃseti vyākhyānādavirodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:443: yata evaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ trividhaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:446: āptavākyatrayādiliṅgatrayāvasitaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ anyatrāpi cetsyāttadā kathameṣāṃ tadanuttamamityato brahmasūtrāṇāmevetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:467: tacca yāvadyāvadadhikaṃ pramīyate tattadanusāriṇīmaviśaṅkāṃ kṣiprapravṛttiṃ prasūta ityanubhavasiddham
GSP33nysu__1u:472: svayaṃ kṛtāpi tadvayākhyā kriyate spaṣṭatārthataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.7 //
GSP33nysu__1u:480: nanu cāsya śāstrasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ sūtrakāra eva prathamasūtre samarthayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:493: tathāpi nedaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ vyākhyātatvādityatrānvapi ceti yat prayojanāntaraṃ astīti sūcitaṃ tadvivaraṇārthamāha- svayamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:494: yadyapi teṣāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ vyākhyā svayaṃ mayaiva bhāṣye kṛtā tathāpi punaratra spaṣṭataivārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya spaṣṭatārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:506: yataḥ saṅkṣepavistarābhyāmuktaṃ śrotṛṇāṃ sugrahaṃ saprayojanaṃ ca bhavati
GSP33nysu__1u:516: śāstraprabhavaṃ ityādibhirbahubhiḥ prakārairyadgurutvopapādanaṃ tena gurūṃśceti bahuvacanāntaṃ padaṃ vivṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:520: nirupapadasūtragrahaṇena yadbrahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaprāmāṇyaṃ sūcitaṃ tadupapādanaṃ paramākhyeti
GSP33nysu__1u:524: yasmādāptimūlatvādiyuktayāpi brahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayituṃ etaditi darśayati gururgurūṇāmityādineti /
GSP33nysu__1u:527: maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyaṃ parisamāpyante pracīyante ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:536: nahi sāmagrīvaikalyena sādhyaṃ vyabhicaran heturahetuḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:538: nahi pratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ ajanayat kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:550: naca pratyakṣāderatrāvakāśa iti śrutireva śiṣyācāramūlaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:553: naca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnā eva na santīti tatparihārārthānanuṣṭhānaṃ na doṣāyeti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:555: yato maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavantyāyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:558: kiṃ nāma granthādau na niveśitamityapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:579: anyathādhikāriviṣayavaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīyatvaśaṅkā na nirākṛtā syādityanarthakaṃ sūtramāpadyetetyata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__1u:592: yatparyāyāntaraṃ vihāyānayoreva kramāntaraṃ vihāyādāvevopādānaṃ tena jānīmo jñāpakatayā'disūtrasya kārakatayā samastaśāstrasya copayogitvenaitau sūtrakṛtā vivakṣitāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:598: atra yatpareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ”maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:601: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:602: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ lakṣyaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:604: naca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ'; /
GSP33nysu__1u:625: evaṃcāyamoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā maṅgalārthatayā sūtrādāvupanibaddha ityanupapannamityata āha- sarvatra iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:626: akhilaiḥ sūtrapāṭhakaiḥ yatpṛthagasaṃhitatayoṅkriyate tatsarvatra sūtreṣvanugatatvenābhilaṣitena nimittenopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:630: “sravatyanoṅkṛtaṃ brahma parastācca viśīryate'; iti śrautārthavādasāmarthyātsarvāsvapi brahmavidyāsvādyantayoroṅkārasyohaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:636: tasya saṃhitatayā nirdeśe prathamasūtrāvayava evāyaṃ vijñāyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:638: naca vyākhyānato 'pyadhikāro jñāyata iti vyarthaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:640: tadanenāsaṃhitatayā nirdeśe nimittāntaraṃ vadatā hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:641: nanu ca śrautārthavādabalenādyantayoroṅkārasyoho vā prāṅmukhatvādivadbahirbhūtasyaiva uccāraṇaṃ vā vidheyatvena kalpyamiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:644: vakṣyamāṇanyāyenoṅkārārthasya prathamasūtravākyārthe samanvayena niścayopapattau bādhitaviṣayaṃ cānumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:647: akhilairvedapāṭhakaiḥ pṛthagrūpāntareṇa sthānavyatyāsena yadoṅkriyate taduktanyāyenādāvuccāraṇenaiva labdhena sarvatrānugatatvena kāraṇenaivopapadyata ityanena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā
GSP33nysu__1u:650: tadevaṃ siddhe śāstravyākhyeyatve prekṣāvatpravṛttiviṣayasyaiva ārambhaṇīyatvātprayojanābhidheyasambandhavatyeva ca prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtterārambhaṇīyatāsiddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayituṃ prayojanādyabhisambandhaṃ pratipādayataḥ prathamasūtrasya vyākhyāmotatvavācītyādinā ārabhate /
GSP33nysu__1u:652: nanu brahmajñānasya mokṣahetutā yadi śāstrapravṛtteḥ prāgeva pramāṇāntarasiddhā vyarthaṃ tadā tadabhidhānaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__1u:654: athehaiva tanniścayastadā pravṛttau prayojanādiniścayo niścite ca prayojanādau pravṛttirityanyonyāśrayatvam
GSP33nysu__1u:658: evameva tatra pravṛttāvuttaratrāpi tathātvaprasaṅgādanarthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:667: naca mumukṣuṇā anapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:668: puruṣātharsādhane tu icchālakṣaṇā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttistathā na svarasasiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:670: tasmādyo yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tatprayojanādikaṃ darśayitvaiva iti sārthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānam
GSP33nysu__1u:672: uktaṃ ca prayojanādikaṃ śrotā kataṃ śraddadhītāśraddadhānaśca kathaṃ pravarteteti punaravaśiṣyate
GSP33nysu__1u:675: yadyapi āptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanādyanabhidhāne 'pi tatsāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanādimadidaṃ śāstraṃ āptoktatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:679: saca prayojanādiviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakaṃ tadabhidhānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:681: nanu sandehaḥ prayojanādyavacane 'pi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve sati sulabha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:684: yo hi yadvacanātpravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:686: nahi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ na veti yatra tatrocchṛṅkhalaḥ svayaṃ utprekṣya pravartate
GSP33nysu__1u:702: kiñcāptatvaṃ sūtrakṛto yena vedādinā pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ tenaiva prayojanādyabhisambandho 'pi śāstrasyāvagamyata iti vyarthaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:705: nahi kaścitprayojanādisandehe 'timahāyāsasādhye pravartate prāguktānarthaparamparāśca kathaṃ na śaṅketa /
GSP33nysu__1u:706: tasmānnedaṃ prayojanādyupadeśamātraṃ kintu śrautasya prayojanādeḥ nyeyenopapādanārthamityeva parihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:707: āptatvaṃ tu nyāyasyopodbalakamātramiti bhāṣyakārīyaṃ tadvyutpādanamapi nānarthakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:727: yadīdaṃ śāstraṃ pareṇopalabhyeta tadoktasandehakāraṇopapattau prayojanārthitvena viśeṣasmṛtimataivaṃ sandihyeteti sūtrakṛta eva parakīyasambhāvitasaṃśayāharaṇopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:730: nahi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ taddvārabhūtanyāyanibandhanaṃ ca nārambhaṇīyamiti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:734: etacchāstravyutpādanīyanyāyakaraṇikāyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ ubhayavidhavyāpāradarśanādviśeṣādarśanācca saṃśayaḥ kiṃ kartavyā na veti /
GSP33nysu__1u:735: nanu ca tadvijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śrutivihitatvāt kathaṃ viśeṣādarśanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:742: kṛṣṭādikaṃ hi sati viṣayabhūte bhūmyādau prayojane ca sasyādhigamādāvadhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvalādau kartavyamupalabdham /
GSP33nysu__1u:743: sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamāneto vyāpyāmapi kartavyatāṃ vyāvartayatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:744: viṣayaśūnyatvāddhi samanaskendriyasannikṛṣṭasya sphītālokamadhyavartino ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:746: sambandhavaidhuryāddhi saprayojanaṃ saviṣayamapi śabdajñānamarthayamāno na vaidyake pravartate
GSP33nysu__1u:765: evaṃ tarhi tata eva na jijñāsyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:769: nanvayaṃ kartā bhoktā doṣasaṃsargī cāhaṃpratyaye prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:777: yatkvacicchāstre 'pi laukikapravedanīyārthavyutpādanamanuvādo 'sau na punaḥ sa eva pradhānavyāpāraḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:784: jīvasya cāhamiti svaprakāśatayā svaprakāśajñānāśrayatayā mānasapratyakṣavedyatayā vā siddhatvena na jijñāsāviṣayatvamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:805: svataḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre tu vedaviruddhānāmapi śākyādivacasāṃ tathātvāpātena punarvedāpramāṇyatādavasthyam
GSP33nysu__1u:810: prayojanaṃ ceśvarajijñāsayā abhyudayo vā syāt mokṣo vā /

GSP33nysu__1u:830: atha parāmārtha evāyaṃ bandhastarhi na jñānena nivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:836: śarīrādyabhāve ca tatsādhyasukhābhāvena kasyāpi tatrārthitānupapatteranadhikārikaṃ śāstramāpadyeta
GSP33nysu__1u:837: ko hi svasthātmā sahasā sukhatatsādhane hātumutsahate /
GSP33nysu__1u:840: śāstraṃ cedamanārambhaṇīyamiti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavānācāryaḥ- oṃ athāto brahmajijñāseti
GSP33nysu__1u:847: atra yaduktaṃ jīvavyatirikta īśvara eva nāstīti tatparihārāya sūtrakṛtoṅkārabrahmaśabdau prayuktau
GSP33nysu__1u:854: nahi padaṃ cakṣurādivadapratīta evārthe pratītiṃ janayati yenāpūrvamarthaṃ padaprayogādeva pratīmaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:864: tathāca yadyasau karmāṇi tadā karturyadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇo
GSP33nysu__1u:869: tathā ca pūrvavadyogyatayā “atha kasmāducyate brahmeti bṛhanto hyasmin
GSP33nysu__1u:880: tadetāvoṅkārabrahmaśabdāvapi yaugiko jijñāsyamanantaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ pratipādayantau jīvajaḍayostadayogāttadvayatiriktameva kiñcidgramayataḥ taccāviditatvātsambhavati jijñāsāviṣayaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:886: yattvāpterādimattvādvetyādyoṅkārasya nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisamanvitamityādi brahmaśabdasya vyākhyānam tajjīvādivyatiriktavastusādhanāvirodhīti sphuṭamevetyāśayavatā na vyākhyānāntaraṃ dūṣitamanumataṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:913: na cālaukikārthakalpane gauravaprasaṅgādvaraṃ kathañcideṣāṃ śabdānāṃ jīvādiviṣayāṅgīkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:920: tathāca śrautaṃ brahmādiśabdaṃ jīvādiviṣayamaṅgīkurvāṇenāpi niravagrahapūrṇatāyuktaṃ kiñcidabhidheyaṃ mukhyamaṅgīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:924: sa eva bhargaśabdārtho vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūmataḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:946: kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca sa evārtha ityata āha- bhūmata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:960: kimato na hi vyāhṛtaya eva veda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:963: nanu gāyatṛyāṃ yo bhargo no 'smākaṃ dhiyaḥ pracodayātprerayettasya saviturdevasya tadvareṇyaṃ rūpaṃ dhīmahi cintayāma iti bharganāmakaḥ savitā pratipādyo dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:964: tatkathaṃ bhagavatparatvamityata āha- sa eva bhargaśabdārtha iti //

GSP33nysu__1u:979: “sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛpuriṣayo nainena kiñcanānāvṛtaṃ nainena kiñcanāsaṃvṛtam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:982: siddhe ca puruṣasūktārthatve viṣṇoḥ kiṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:988: “sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti'; ityādiśrutisiddhamapi bhagavataḥ sarvavedārthatvaṃ nyāyenopapādayitumayaṃ prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:991: yo yadvayākhyeyārthaḥ sa tadartho yathā sampratipanna iti vā sarvo veda īśvaraparastatparoṅkāravyākhyānatvāditi vā sākṣādevānumānaṃ kiṃ na vyākhyāyate /

GSP33nysu__1u:993: santṛṇṇā'; ityādiśrutyā hetvarthasamarthanaṃ bhaviṣyati kimanena paramparāvyākhyānena /
GSP33nysu__1u:995: tathāpi vākyāntarabalena na sarvā vāgoṅkāravyākhyānaṃ sākṣātkiṃ nāmoktaprakāreṇa paramparayaiveti jñāpayitumitthaṃ vyākhyānamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:996: nanu ceśvare pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭavata oṃkārabrahmaśabdāveva kasmānnoktau kiṃ vedānumānena /
GSP33nysu__1u:1004: viṣayasambandhasambhavājjijñāsāyāḥ kartavyatā śāstrasya cārambhaṇīyatvaṃ siddhamityāśayavān sākāṅkṣasya vākyābhāsasyāpratipādakatvādākāṅkṣitādhyāhāraṃ sūcayansūtravākyārthamāha-
GSP33nysu__1u:1006: ayamiti uktavidhayā jīvajaḍātmakātprapañcādatyantaviviktatvena niścitatayā viṣayabhūtaḥ sarvavedārthatayā śakyapratipādanaścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1013: na hi bījasyāṅkuraṃ janayataḥ sahakāriṇo jalāderaṅkuro na kāryam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1038: tathāpi pratibandhanivṛttau satyāmeva nirṇaya iti pratibandhakanirāsahetorapi vicārasyopacāreṇa nirṇayahetutvādupapannamīśvaraviṣayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1040: īśvarasya vedapramāṇakatve tata eva niścitatvātkiṃ mīmāṃsayeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1044: apare tu tadaṅgīkṛtyāpi tadvācināṃ padānāṃ jīvādiviṣayatāṃ vyākurvantastadabhāvamasthitāḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:1045: anye tu punarastīśvaraḥ kintu paramārthato nirguṇa eveti saṅgirante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1046: eke tu saguṇo 'pi na jagataḥ kāraṇamapi tūdāsīna evetyātiṣṭhante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1050: kecidvigrahavantamityevamādyāsvanekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattvajñānakaraṇādapi vedāttadanutpattau tadapanodanadvāreṇa vedetikartavyatārūpā jijñāsā kartavyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1052: tatra tāvadbrahmaṇo jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso na punardharmāya jijñāsetivaccaturthīsamāsaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:1053: tādarthyasamāse prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti vārtikakṛtā prakṛtivikārabhāva eva caturthīsamāsasya niyamitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1062: jijñāsā khalu karmāpekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātuṃ śakyā na tu sambandhinaṃ vineti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāttadeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1065: evaṃ sati lakṣaṇādijijñāsāpi pratijñātā syāditi cenna /

GSP33nysu__1u:1089: apare tu kāryaniṣṭha eva vedabhāgo vicāryatvena tatra prakrānto vicāritaśca na vastutattvaniṣṭha ityato vastutattvaniṣṭhaṃ vedabhāgaṃ vicārayitumidamārabhyata ityāhuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1092: dharmajijñāsāśāstraṃ tu vedaikadeśāmukhyārthadharmavicārāya pravṛttamityāśayena vā”sa eva bhargaśabdārthaḥ'; ityādyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1093: tatra sarvavedārtha ityanena gatārthatāśaṅkānirāsaḥ sa eva na tu kāryaśeṣatayetyādyaṃ samādhānaṃ sarveti dvitīyaṃ ca nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1097: jñānī priyatamo 'to me taṃ vidvāneva cāmṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.11cd //

GSP33nysu__1u:1104: vākyamevaśabdena”nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya'; ityuttaravākyamavadhāraṇārthaṃ ca saṅgṛhītam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1106: vṛṇute yamityanena”yamevaiṣa vṛṇute'; iti vākyaṃ saṅgṛhītam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1119: na punaḥ karmādineti jñānī priyatamastamevaṃ vidvānityuktibalenāvagamyate

GSP33nysu__1u:1147: prasādo nāmecchāviśeṣo guṇāntaraṃ vā na naḥ kacit kṣatiḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:1156: darśanāsādhanaṃ cānugrahaḥ svayogyaguṇopetasya nirdoṣasya bhagavadvigrahaviśeṣasyādaranairantaryābhyāṃ viṣayavairāgyatadbhaktisahitād bahukālopacitānnididhyāsanāparanāmakādvicintanādṛte na labhyate naca nididhyāsanaṃ vākyārthagrahaṇalakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte 'pi vinā mananāparanāmnā vicāreṇopapadyate

GSP33nysu__1u:1247: prasanna evāsau svakīyāṃ māyāṃ vyāvartayatīti tatprasādārthaṃ sarvo
GSP33nysu__1u:1249: tato yadyapi na sūtrākṣarebhyo bhagavatprasādo labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1252: evamuktena nyāyena na jñānasyaivāyaṃ svabhāvo yatsākṣānmokṣasādhanatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1254: sakalakārakāṇāṃ tadadhīnasattāpravṛttitvena tadicchāṃ vinā kasyāpi kāryasyānudayāditi /

GSP33nysu__1u:1274: kiñca loke tāvadanādiḥ prāgabhāvo nivartate sugatānāṃ tattvapatibhāvanāprakarṣeṇānādivāsanāsantānānāṃ nivṛttiriṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1296: tatra kiṃ nivartakābhāva upādhiranenocyate kiṃ vā nivartakasadbhāvena satpratipakṣatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1303: yadapi prāgabhāve vyabhicārodbhāvanaṃ tadapi bhāvatvena hetuviśeṣaṇādayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1319: svayameva hyanādibhāvarūpaṃ yadvijñānena vilīyata ityajñānalakṣaṇamabhidhāya bhāvarūpāmānasādhanāya pramāṇānyupanyastāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:1336: ādye dhūmavānagnimāniti sāmānyavyāpteḥ parvato niragnika iti viśeṣavyāptirbalavatī prasajyeta
GSP33nysu__1u:1342: yadanādi tadajñānātiriktaṃ na nivartata iti saṅkocanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1343: na punaryadanāditvarahitaṃ tadeva jñānanivartyamiti saṅkocyamityatra niyāmakābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1347: vyāptibalenājñānasya jñānanivartyatve siddhe 'nāditvasya tatraiva vyabhicāra iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1361: kiñca tu śuktikājñānaṃ nāma kiṃ jñānābhāvo 'tha bhāvarūpamajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1372: yadapi nirupādānasya vināśānupapattimāśaṅkayoktaṃ svāśrayagatottarāvasthā vināśa iti /

GSP33nysu__1u:1375: paramāṇuśyāmatāpratibandī tu tasyā api sopādānatvenaiva nirasteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1377: yattāvadavidyāyā anāditvenānivṛttiriti so 'yaṃ prasaṅgaḥ svatantrānumānaṃ vā /

GSP33nysu__1u:1390: nanvavayavatatsaṃyogavināśābhyāṃ dravyanāśo dṛṣṭastatkathamatra vināśa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1410: sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ sadyaḥ śarīrādipāte vātaputrīyāḥ pauruṣeyā brahmopadeśāḥ prasajyeranniti
GSP33nysu__1u:1415: yena so 'pi kathaṃ teṣāṃ neti paryanuyujyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1416: bhakteḥ parāvasthā hi taddheturuktā tatsampattiśca kāryagamyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1426: vastutastu bhagavāneva anāderapi bandhasya nivartaka iti
GSP33nysu__1u:1436: tato 'vidyāyāṃ nivṛttāyāmapi nāśeṣānandābhivyaktiryāvadīśvara eva svakīyāṃ bandhaśaktiṃ na tato vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1440: evaṃ tāvatsvamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya tatpariśuddhaye pareṣāṃ bhāṣyaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:1448: svapadāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyaṃ bhāṣyavido viduriti hi bhāṣyalakṣaṇamācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1452: tatrāthāto brahmajijñāsetisūtre anuvādatvaparihārāya śāstre puruṣapravṛttisiddhaye ca kartavyeti padamadhyāhāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1453: jijñāsāpadaṃ cānuṣṭhānayogyasyāntarṇītasya vicārasyopalakṣaṇamiti sthite sādhanacatuṣyayasampannasya brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya śrauto 'rthaḥ sampadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1455: sannidhānācca vedāntavākyavicāra iti śrutyarthābhyāṃ sādhanacatuṣyayasampannasya mokṣasādhanabrahmajñānāya vedāntavākyavicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya tātparyeṇa pratipādyo 'rtho 'vagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1456: evaṃca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgatayā 'rthataḥ sūtritasya prayojanāderupapādakaṃ bandhamithyātvamiti tadapi sūtrārtha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1463: tena sūtrakāreṇaiva brahmajñānamanarthahetunibarhaṇaṃ sūtrayatāvidcāhetukaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1466: tasya cāhaṃ kartā bhokteti pratīyamānaṃ rūpaṃ yadi paramārthikaṃ syāt tadāsandigdhatayā vicāraviṣayatā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1468: pāramārthikaṃ niṣkrayaṃ niṣkalaṃ brahmarūpaṃ syāttato 'sya sandidhatayā viṣayatocyamānopapadyate
GSP33nysu__1u:1469: tenātmasvarūpaṃ vicāraviṣayaṃ sūtrayatā sūtrakṛtaiva kartṛtvādyatadākārasya mithyātvaṃ sūtritaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1470: kartṛtvāderbandhasya mithyātvaṃ ca yāvatā vinā nopapadyate tadapi sūtritameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1482: ato yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ śabdasāmarthyenārthavaśādvā pratīyate sa sarvastadartha eveti bhavatyayamarthakalāpastanmahimādhigataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:1491: asya śāstrasyaidaṃparyaṃ sukhaikatānasadātmakūṭasthacaitanyaikarasatāsaṃsāritvābhimatasyātmanaḥ pāramārthikaṃ svarūpamiti vedāntāḥ paryavasyantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1492: taccāhaṃ kartā sukhī duḥkhīti pratyakṣābhimatenābādhitakalpenāvabhāsena viruddhayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1493: atastadvirodhaparihārārthaṃ brahmasvarūpapiparītarūpamavidyānimittamātmana iti yāvanna pratipādyate tāvajjaradgavādivākyavadanarthakaṃ pratibhāti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1500: yatkhalu pramitamapyanupapadyamānaṃ svopapattaye yadapekṣate tattadākṣipati nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1501: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhe 'bhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ na punaḥ śabdānityatvam
GSP33nysu__1u:1504: evaṃca prayojanatayoktā muktiryadi bandhamithyātvāmapekṣeta tadā tadākṣipet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1513: yathā ca mithyābhūtasya svāpnanigaḍabandhasya prabodhenaiva sākṣāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1514: tatra brahmajñānātsaṃsārabandhanivṛttiḥ sūtritā kaṃ pakṣamavalambyatāmiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1519: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mucyata iti śrutirdarśanamokṣāvantarā kiñcinna sahata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1529: pramite ca sādhyasādhanabhāve kā nāmānupapattiryacchamanāyopapādakaṃ mṛgyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1547: anādeścājñānasya nivṛttāvātmano 'pi nivṛttiḥ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1550: kvedamupalabdhaṃ bhavatā yatsatyaṃ na nivartata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1551: nivṛttāvanāditvamaprayojakīkṛtya mithyātvaṃ prayojakīkurvatājñānasya yena kenāpi nivṛttiḥ kasmānneṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1554: hanta tarhi virodhisadbhāva eva nivṛttau prayojaka iti kuta ātmanivṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1556: nanu jñānena satyaṃ nivartamānaṃ kiṃ viṣayagataṃ nivartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1560: yataścitrāvayavini nīlaviśiṣṭadravyajñānaṃ svaviṣayaṃ vā svaviṣayasamavetaṃ vā rasādikaṃ virodhinaṃ vā pītimādiguṇaṃ na nivartayati
GSP33nysu__1u:1567: yadi jñānamāśrayagataṃ nivartayet tadā dharmādikamapi nivartayedityatra vyāptyayogāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1574: ekameva hi citraṃ nāma rūpamāśrayavyāpyavṛttīti padārthavidaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1576: astu vā jñānamajñānasyaiva nivartakamiti vyāptistathātrapa bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate
GSP33nysu__1u:1581: api ca satyasyāpi viṣasya garuḍadhyānena nivṛttidarśanādbandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate
GSP33nysu__1u:1587: tarhi tadeva na jñānānnivṛttamiti na mithyābhūtasyāpi jñānānnivṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1592: tato varaṃ sa eva prayojaka ityaṅgīkāro lāghavāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1601: yadi ca mānasī sṛṣṭiriti matam anumatametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1624: nanu yathā mithyābhūtācchaśaviṣāṇādervyāvṛttau dhvaṃsaḥ satye paryavasyatīti bhavatocyate
GSP33nysu__1u:1625: tathā satyāccidātmano 'pi vyāvṛttau mithyābhūte paryavasyatīti mayāpi vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1626: satyamāpātatastathā tathāpyapi sautrī arthāpattiḥ sandehāskanditā kuṇṭhitaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1632: api caivam- uktirbrahmajñānaṃ jīvagataṃ bandhaṃ nivartayatīti sautrī prayojanoktirbandhamithyātvaṃ nāpekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1633: yadi jīvajñānaṃ jīvagatasya bandhasya nivartakamiti prayojanoktiḥ sūtre syāttadā kathañcidapekṣetāpi bandhamithyātvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1634: nacaivaṃ sūtrakṛdāha- nahi śuktikāyāmāropitaṃ rajataṃ ghaṭajñānānnivartate
GSP33nysu__1u:1635: brahmajñānaṃ nāma tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya tatpadārthena brahmaṇaikyānubhava iti tu svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaṃ pralāpamātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:1637: api ca yadi bandhamithyātvaṃ yadi ca jñānamātrādbandhabādhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1638: tadā jñāne sati kimapi muktirnaivāpekṣata iti sadya eva sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ śarīrādinivṛttiḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:1643: yadi hi sūtre jīvātmano viṣayatayoktiḥ syāttadā sā tasya sandigdhatāsiddhaye katṛtvādibandhamithyātvaṃ kathañcidapekṣetāpi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1650: evamuktiḥ sakalajagajjanmādinimittatvalakṣaṇaṃ samastajīvajaḍātmakātprapañcadatyantavyāvṛttaṃ brahmaivāśeṣavedapratipādyamityevaṃ tattu samanvayādityādikoktirjīvagatabandhamithyātvaṃ nāpekṣate eṣā hi brahmaṇyeva pramāṇābhāsapratipannasya jīvābhedādereva mithyātvamapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1651: yadi hi jīvasya brahmatāyāṃ sakalavedāntaparyavasānaṃ pratipādayitumidaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ syāttadā virodhaśāntyai bandhamithyātvāpekṣā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1661: na kevalaṃ bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate kiṃ nāma bandhasya mithyātvaṃ nāstītyapisambandhaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:1665: tathātve vā pramāṇavaiyarthyaṃ pūrvapramāṇasyāpi tathātvenānavasthā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1668: evaṃ tarhi paricitacarapuruṣasya divābhuñjānasya pīnatvamanupapadyamānaṃ rasāyanasiddhiṃ yogarddhiṃ vā kasmānnākṣipet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1675: asiddhaṃ sādhayati pramāṇaṃ na tu pramāṇaviruddhamiti hi prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:1682: vayamapi hi bandhamithyātvamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣaviruddhatvādeva nārthāpattiprameyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1686: ceṣyādiliṅgairahamityeva yo vedya ityādyāgamaiścātmanaḥ kartṛtvādyupetasyaiva pramitatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:1689: nanu pratyakṣaṃ bandhasvarūpamātraṃ gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātvābhāvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1693: pratyakṣaṃ khalu bandhaṃ gocarayadastīti nāstīti vā gocarayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1704: na caitānyupakramādivaśādīdṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni kenāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33nysu__1u:1706: yeyaṃ caitanyasya svata eva sthitalakṣaṇabrahmarūpatāvabhāsaṃ pratibadhya
GSP33nysu__1u:1709: saca cidātmano buddhayā niṣkṛṣṭa vedāntavādibhirantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirahaṃpratyayīti ca vijñānaśaktiviśeṣamāśritya gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1713: tadevamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣe śrutyādivirodhena pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandhamithyātvavyutpādanamupapannataramityata
GSP33nysu__1u:1727: ata eva hyasataḥ sadajāyatetyādivākyapratipanno 'rthaḥ kutastu khalu somyaiyaṃ syātkathamasataḥ sañjāyetetyupapattiviruddhastyajyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1731: evaṃ yadi duḥkhāderātmātiriktasya samastasya mithyātvaṃ śrutyādibalena syāttarhi tasya śrutyādivākyasya tāvanmithyātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1733: anyathā svasminnevāsya prāmāṇyaṃ pratihatamiti na kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1734: yadi cedaṃ vākyaṃ mithyā syāttathāpi na duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1746: kriyājñāne prati kārakāntarāprayojyatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarāyattamātmani svato vidyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1752: tāṃścātmano viviktānapi vispaṣṭatayānupalabhamānastaddharmānduḥkhādīṃtsatyānevātmīyatvena paśyaṃstatkṛte nīcoccatvalakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva pratipadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1753: tato rāgadveṣābhyāṃ prayuktastadvinivṛttaye yatkaroti tadapyetādṛgevātanotītyanekayoniṣu bambhramīti
GSP33nysu__1u:1754: na kvāpyātyantikaṃ tadupaśamaṃ labhate vinā paramapuruṣārādhanāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1758: atastannirākaraṇanirbandho yukta evetyetatparibhāvayituṃ bandhamithyātvamiti saṃmugdhe prastute 'pi duḥkhāderiti niṣkṛṣṭoktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1762: yadapi pareṇātmānātmanoritaretarādhyāsasamarthanāya tametamavidyākhyamātmānātmanoritaretarādhyāsaṃ puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā pramāṇāntaramādarśitam tadanenaiva nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1764: nacānenāntaḥkaraṇaśarīrendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ taddharmāṇāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ ca mithyātvaṃ siddhayati
GSP33nysu__1u:1802: na cāyamasti niyamo yatsmaryamāṇamaśeṣasambandhiviśeṣasahitaṃ smaryata iti
GSP33nysu__1u:1805: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ saiva hi satyādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1810: atrāpi yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivadvayakhyānamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1812: “māmeva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te'; iti svaprapannamāyānirasanasamarthasyeśvarasyāpyahaṃ sarvasya prabhava ityādyullekhopalambhācca /
GSP33nysu__1u:1814: yatprakṛtipariṇāmavāci makārāntamavyayamahaṃpadaṃ na jātu tadātmani prayujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1815: yaccātmavāci dakārāntāsmacchabdajaṃ tanna kadācidapi māyāpariṇāme prayujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1816: tadevaṃ sarvamithyātvaparatve śrutereva mithyātvaprasaṅgenāsādhakatvāpattau duḥkhādibandhamithyātvāsiddhayā na pratyakṣamatattvāvedakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1822: vākyena sakṛdeva jātāyāḥ sakalamithyātvaviṣayāyā buddheḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāya parīkṣakabuddhaya eva tadviṣayaṃ buddhayā vibhajya krameṇāvagāhanta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1824: mithyāyāḥ sādhakatvaṃ ca na siddhaṃ prativādinaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.17cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1827: mayā mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvābhyupagamādityata āha- mithyāyā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1835: dvitīyastu satyasyaiva sādhakatvamiti manyamāno yadīdaṃ vākyaṃ sakalamithyātvaṃ pratipādayettadā sakalāntargatatvātsvayamapi mithyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1837: yadi caitadvākyaṃ mithyā syānna kasyāpyarthasya sādhakaṃ syādityaniṣyaprasaṅgaṃ paśyankathaṃ tvadabhyupagamamātreṇa svatarkasya viruddhatāṃ pratipadyeteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1843: tatkimavidyamānasyāpi vākyasya nirdoṣapadāvayavatvādikaṃ vidyata iti vaktumudyato bhavān /
GSP33nysu__1u:1844: evaṃca vadatā bhavatā kasmiṃścana vipratipanne 'rthe vandhyāsutavacanaṃ pramāṇayantaṃ prativādinaṃ prati nūnaṃ padadoṣādikamevopapādya sādhakatvaṃ dūṣayiṣyate /

GSP33nysu__1u:1871: tathāpi mithyāsatyayoḥ satyamarthataḥ pradhānamiti tatkrameṇa dūṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1872: satā cedityataḥ paramātmarūpeṇa tadanyena veti vikalpaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:1914: yato 'tra, yatsādhakaṃ na tanmithyā, yacca mithyā na tatsādhakam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1991: evamubhayavādisampratipannaṃ pramāṇaṃ svamate 'stīti darśayituṃ satyasya sākṣiṇo 'jñānasādhakatvaṃ parābhyupagatamupanyastam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1999: yacca nirviśeṣaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādi na tatsādhakamiti pareṇa niyamasyāṅgīkṛtatvāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:2018: anyathā śabdānityatve kṛtakatvamupanyasya pareṇānyatarāsiddhāvudbhāvitāyāṃ tatsādhanasphūrtimatāpi tūṣṇīṃ bhavitavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2019: ahaṃ cāviśeṣasya sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvaṃ vipratipattau sādhayiṣyāmīti /

GSP33nysu__1u:2039: tathāpi prāgyanmithyābhūtasyāpi sādhakatvaṃ pramāṇavikalpanirākaraṇena nirastaṃ tatsaviśeṣatvādivikalpanirākaraṇenāpi nirākaraṇīyamiti sūcanāya sāmānyena napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2040: etena prāgvikalpitaḥ satā'tmabhūteneti pakṣo 'pi nirasto veditavyaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:2049: yadi caitanyātiriktaṃ samastaṃ mithyā syāttadā samastāntargataṃ kathāvyavahārāṅgabhūtaṃ pramāṇādikamapi mithyā syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:2068: pramāṇādīnāṃ kathāvyavahārakāraṇatvātkāraṇābhāve ca kāryābhāvasya sulabhatvātsustho 'tiprasaṅgamūlabhūtaḥ pratibandha iti jñāpayituṃ

GSP33nysu__1u:2073: caśabdo na kevalaṃ vyavahāro vyāvahārikaṃ ceti sambaddhayate /

GSP33nysu__1u:2078: kiṃ vāgvyavahārasya pramāṇādisattābhyupagamavyāptatvena tadabhāve pravartayitumaśakyatvādatha kathakapravartanīyavāgvyavahāraṃ prati hetubhāvāduta lokasiddhatvādathavā tadanabhyupagamasya tattvanirṇayavijayātiprasaktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2092: tena jñāyate vyavahārasya sādhanādyakṣamatāyāṃ sadvacanābhāsalakṣaṇayogitvameva prayojakam
GSP33nysu__1u:2095: tadā vyavahāra eva dharmī kathaṃ siddhayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2099: na brūmo vayaṃ na santi pramāṇādīnīti svīkṛtya kathārabhyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2100: kiṃ nāma santi na santi pramāṇādīnītyasyāṃ cintāyāmudāsīnairyathā svīkṛtya tāni bhavatā vyavahriyante
GSP33nysu__1u:2102: kiñca kīdṛśīṃ maryādāmavalambya pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāmidaṃ dūṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2103: kiṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ sattvamupagamyobhābhyāṃ vādiprativādibhyāṃ pravartitāyāmutāsattvamabhyupetyāthaikena sattvamapareṇa cāsattvamaṅgīkṛtya /
GSP33nysu__1u:2110: tasmātpramāṇādisattvāsattvābhyupagamaudāsīnyena, vyavahāraniyame samayaṃ baddhvā, pravartitāyāṃ kathāyāṃ, bhavatedaṃ dūṣaṇamuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2112: naca vācyaṃ nedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prativādinaṃ pratyucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2113: kiṃ nāma śiṣyādayaḥ pramāṇādisattānabhyupagantuḥ kathānadhikāraṃ jñāpyanta iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2119: syādapyevaṃ yadi kathakapravartanīyavāgvyavahāraṃ prati pramāṇādīnāṃ hetutā tatsattānabhyupagame nivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2121: tathā sati tatsattānabhyupagantṛṇāṃ vāgvyavahārasvarūpameva na niṣpadyeta
GSP33nysu__1u:2127: kayāpi niyamasthityā pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathakavāgvyavaharaṃ prati hetutvātpramāṇādīnāṃ sattvaṃ sattvāccābhyupagamo bhavatā prasādhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2128: kathātaḥ pūrvaṃ tu tattvāvadhāraṇaṃ paraparājayaṃ vābhilaṣadbhayāṃ kathakābhyāṃ yāvatā vinā tadabhilaṣitaṃ na paryavasyati tāvadanuroddhavyam
GSP33nysu__1u:2129: tacca vyavahāraniyamasamayabandhādeva dvābhyāmapi tābhyāṃ sambhāvyata iti vyavahāraniyamameva badhnītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2133: pramāṇādisattāmabhyupetyāpi tathāvidhavyavahāraniyamavyatirekeṇa kathāpravṛttiṃ vinā tattvanirṇayasya jayasya vābhilaṣitasya kathakayoraparyavasānāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2135: lokavyavahāro 'pi pramāṇavyavahāro vā syāt pāmarādisādhāraṇavyavahāro vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2142: tarhi pramāṇādisattāpi yadi vicārabādhyā bhaviṣyati tadā nābhyupeyaiva anyathā tūpagantavyeti lokavyavahārasiddhatayā sattvamabhyupagamyata iti tāvanna bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2162: kiṃ nāma yadi pramāṇādīni santi na syuḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:2172: māyāvādinaṃ tadvayavahāraṃ vā pakṣīkṛtya viśiṣṭavyavahārakartṛtvena viśiṣṭavyavahāratvena vā hetunā pramāṇādisattābhyupagantṛtve tatpūrvakatve vā sādhyamāne tatsyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2177: yadā hi pramāṇādisattā nābhyupagatā tadā tadasattvamevāṅgīkṛtamiti svarūpasiddhatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2179: nanvetadāśaṅkayoktaṃ na brūmo vayamityādi duruktaṃ tat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2184: yaśca tatsattāṃ pratītyāpi sattā'dyudāsīno 'hamiti manyate taṃ pratīdaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:2187: nahi vayaṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamaṃ kathāpravṛttikāraṇatayāvaśyaṃ tataḥ pūrvabhāvinaṃ brūmaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:2188: kiṃ nāma yo yathākathañcitkathāyāṃ pravṛttastaṃ vipakṣe kathānutpattiprasaṅgaṃ daṇḍaṃ pradarśya tatkāraṇānāṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ sattāmaṅgīkārayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2192: prativādinaḥ kathāpraveśamabhyupagamya tatra pravṛttaṃ prati pramitakathākāryabalena kāraṇapramāṇādisattāyā abhyupagantavyatvasyoktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2195: yena tatsattānabhyupagantṛṇāṃ vāgvyavahārasvarūpaṃ na niṣpadyeteti prasaṅgaḥ syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:2206: tatra kiṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuta tatsattābhyupagamasya kāraṇakoṭipraveśane
GSP33nysu__1u:2217: kiṃ vicārasādhyaḥ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamo na vicārapravṛtteḥ kāraṇamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2218: kiṃ vā vicārabādhyatāyā eva pramāṇādisattābhyupagamaprayojakatvena vyavahārasyāprayojakatvamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:2221: autsargikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhakādapodyata ityatradarśane tasyaiva prayojakatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2225: teṣāṃ ca taddhetutā nāsatāmupapadyata iti tatsattāvaśyamabhyupagamanīyeti
GSP33nysu__1u:2231: pramāṇaivyarvahartavyamiti ca niyamabandhanaṃ pramāṇakaraṇabhāvasya niyamāntarbhāvānniyatapūrvasattvarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ pramāṇānāmanādāya na paryavasyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2232: dūṣaṇānāṃ cāstitvena bhaṅgāvadhāraṇaniyamabandhane sādhanāṅgānāṃ ca vyāptyādīnāṃ sattvena tadviṣayasya tattvarūpatāvvavahāraniyamanādau ca kaṇṭhoktayaiva tasya tasya sattvamaṅgīkṛtamiti ri??midamucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2233: pramāṇādīnāṃ sattāmanabhyupagamya kathā'rambhaḥ śakyata ityevamāśaṅkaya yaduktametairapi bādhakaiḥ kathāyāmārabdhāyāmabhimatasya prasādhanīyatvena pūrvoktabādhāyā na nistāraḥ syāditi tadapyanenaiva parihṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2234: kathāsvarūpapalaniṣpattaye svecchāsvīkṛtasyaiva vyavahāraniyamasya pramāṇādisattāsvīkāra eva paryavasānamiti kathāyāṃ pravṛttaṃ svavyāghātamapyacetayantaṃ pratyasmābhirucyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2235: nanu kathādeḥ kāryasya sattve kathañcitkāraṇasya pramāṇādeḥ sattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2241: tato 'nyathāsiddhayā tarkasyābhāsatāsiddhistasyāṃ ca śrutyādiprāmāṇyasiddhiriti cakrakāpattyā naikasyāpi siddhiḥ /
