GSP33nysu__1u:2247: na caivaṃ kiṃ nāma vyāvahārikī sattābhyupagamyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2248: tathā ca sarvāntaḥpātino vyavahārasataḥ pramāṇādeḥ sādhakatvasambhavānnoktaprasaṅga ityata āha- vyavahārasataśceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:2252: vyavahārasato 'pi sādhakatvaṃ pūrvasyāsata iva prativādino na siddhameva
GSP33nysu__1u:2255: yadi vyāvahārikaṃ sannāma sadeva tadā mithyātvapratipādanaṃ vyāhatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2261: tatra yasya sarvaprakāreṇa bādhitatvaṃ nāsti tanmukhyaṃ satpāramārthikamiti ca gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2262: yasya tu satpratītireva sattā tadamukhyaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2268: dvitīye 'pi vādiprativādimadhyasthamāsyi tasyāpi kathākāla eva bādhitatvāvagamābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2283: naca pratīteḥ svarūpabhedo 'stītyato vijñānaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2292: tadevaṃ sattraividhyādambarādikaṃ viśvaṃ sadapi pāramārthikatvābhāvānmithyeti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2294: pāramārthikaprātītikavyāvṛttyarthatvena vyāvahārikapadaṃ ca sambhavatīti atredaṃ vaktavyam
GSP33nysu__1u:2295: kiṃ pāramārthikasadeva sadasacca bādhakabhedena dvividhamiti sattraividhyamuta satyevāntarabhedena
GSP33nysu__1u:2301: yadapi tathaiva laukiko vyavahāraḥ pratīyata iti tadagre nirākariṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2305: prāktanniścayātparamārthasata evārthakriyeti manyamānaḥ prativādī kathaṃ bodhanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2308: sattraividhyaṃ ca mānena siddhayet keneti pṛcchyate // MAnuv_1,1.22cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:2312: kenetyasya paramārthasatā vā vyāvahārikasatā vā prātibhāsikasatā vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2315: yathā mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvaṃ kena siddhayediti pṛṣṭaṃ tatheti cārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2317: pṛcchāviṣayatvameva na doṣa ityata āha- tasyāpīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:2318: asataḥ sādhakatvasyeva tasya sattraividhyasyāpi kathañcana vikalpitapakṣeṣu kasmiṃścana pakṣe naiva siddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2333: tatra vyāvahārikasya prapañcasya sadasadvilakṣasya sadvilakṣaṇatvādupapannaṃ śrutyādinā mithyātvasamarthanam
GSP33nysu__1u:2343: viśvasya sadasadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kiṃ satā pramāṇena sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2350: nanvatra sadasadvailakṣaṇye sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgo vācyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2354: sattvābhāve sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi vā prasaṅgaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2369: asataścāpi viśvasya tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.24 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2371: vivādapadaṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ jñānabādhyatvādyadevaṃ tadevaṃ yathā śuktirajatamityanumānaṃ viśvasya sadasadvilakṣaṇatve mānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2384: evamasato 'bhāvātmakasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2386: kiṃ nāmaivaṃ vibhāgena sadasadvailakṣaṇyasiddhayāpi pratijñātārthasiddherarthāntaratā parasya syāditi // 1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2388: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvabhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva
GSP33nysu__1u:2390: asato 'bhāvādapi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sutarāṃ bhāvābhāvabhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2394: sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi sutarāṃ svayaṃ sadeveti tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2401: yadi hi bhāve 'pyabhāvatvamabhāve 'pi bhāvatvamaṅgīkuryāṃ kutastadā bhāvābhāvabhedavādaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:2402: tathāca kathaṃ tena sādhyamānenāniṣyaṃ mama bhavet // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2404: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya bhāvābhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvābhāvarūpatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2410: na bhāvatvamapītyatastena sādhitenāniṣyaṃ mama kathaṃ bhavet // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2411: athaikaikasya vastuno bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ ca sādhyatayā vivakṣitamiti manvīta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2425: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva
GSP33nysu__1u:2430: evamasato 'bhāvarūpasyāpi viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva
GSP33nysu__1u:2435: atha bhāvābhāvābhimatayoḥ sarvathā bhāvābhāvatve na sta ityartho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2436: tathāpi sata eva bhāvasyaivāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2437: yatastasmādviśvasya tena sādhitena bhedavādino 'niṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2442: dvau nañau hi prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2443: evaṃ viyadādikaṃ pakṣīkṛtya bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatve sādhyamāne tasyābhāvatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ syāt
GSP33nysu__1u:2446: tathāca viśvasya bhāvābhāvavibhāgasya ca pareṇābhyupagatatvānna bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mamāniṣyaṃ kiñcit /
GSP33nysu__1u:2451: yataḥ sato bhāvasyaiva viśvasya viyadāderasato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2453: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2455: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2456: ato bhedavādinastena viparītena pratijñātenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2459: vyāvahārikabhāvatvābhāvatvagocaraṃ pramāṇaṃ tattvaviṣayeṇānumānenaiva bādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2463: viśvasya sataḥ satyādvailakṣaṇyamapi mama svayaṃ svamatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2469: sato vidyamānasyāpyasato bhedaṃ vadato mama yathā viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2470: tathā sato 'pi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ satāṃ bhedavādinaḥ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2473: tadāpi sato viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sadasadbhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2477: asata eva hi sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ bhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva niyamena bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2478: tathāca viśvasya tena sattvānadhikaraṇatvena sādhitenāsattvāpattyā parasyaivāniṣyaṃ bhavet
GSP33nysu__1u:2479: aniṣyaprasaṅgena paraṃ nigṛhītavato mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2480: athāsattvānadhikaraṇatve vādiprativādisiddhe sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapyadhikaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2482: kiñca, na sattvaṃ nāmaikamanugataṃ kintu prativastu sattvāni bhidyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2483: tatra viyadāderasadvailakṣaṇye sati sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyamānaṃ kimekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamutānekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamatha sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2487: viśvasyāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ tāvanmama svayameva sato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2490: tathāca siddhena tena sādhyamānena mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2503: yataḥ sata evāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ tadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2505: yataścāsata eva sato vailakṣaṇyamapi niyatamevātastena sādhyamānena viśvasya sadasattvāpattyā bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2508: dvayorapi sarvathā pratiṣedhātkathaṃ sadasattvaprasaṅga iti cettarhyasata eva sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sanniyatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2509: ataḥ sadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarasato 'pi vailakṣaṇyena vyāhatena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2510: evaṃ sata evāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ niyatamityasadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarviśvasya sadvailakṣaṇyapratijñā vyāhatā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2512: asmādeva hetostatsiddhiriti cettarhi mātā vandhyeti pratijñā kuto vipratiṣiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2514: “sambhāvitaḥ pratijñāyā arthaḥ sādhyeta hetunā'; iti nyāyāttatra hetvākāṅkṣaiva nāstīti cetsatyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2515: kiñca sata eva viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2517: atastena bādhitena sarvathā sattvānadhikaraṇatvena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2521: kecitte tavāniṣyaṃ kataṃ na bhavediti vyācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2522: tatra na pādādāviti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyamanityamiti samādhānamavaseyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2524: sanmātratvaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi tasmāt tadapi no bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.25 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2531: anekasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyamityucyate tarhi satāṃ bhedasaṃsthitistataścāpasiddhāntaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:2542: yadi sarvasmātsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyatayocyate tarhi sadbhedasaṃsthitiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2560: yadi sattaiva nāsti tadā tadanadhikaraṇatvapratijñā vyārthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2564: santi sattādhikaraṇāni santīti cettarhi kānīti vaktavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2577: tathāhi sattāsāmānyavidhurasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ sanmātratvaṃ svarūpasattvaṃ tāvadasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2581: arthakriyākāritvaṃ jñānābādhyatvaṃ vā sattvamiti pakṣadvayaṃ sphuṭadoṣatvānna dūṣitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2589: tvayāpi dve tattve sadasidati tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā yadeva sattvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyaiva mayāpyaṅgīkārānna sacchabdārthāniruktiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2596: vijñātasyānyathā samyag vijñānaṃ hyeva tanmatam // MAnuv_1,1.26 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2602: jñānabādhyatvaṃ hi jñānanivartyatvaṃ vā pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ vā hetutvena parasyābhimatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2610: api tarhyajñānopādānakasya samāne viṣaye virodhitā jñānenopādāne nivṛtte svayameva vilapanam
GSP33nysu__1u:2612: “ajñānasya svakāryeṇa vartamānena pravilīnena vā saha jñānena
GSP33nysu__1u:2617: tathāvidhamapi jñānabādhyatvaṃ pakṣaikadeśe prakṛtyādau na siddhaṃ prativādina iti bhāgāsiddhatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:2619: naca vipakṣe kiñcidbādhakamastītyato 'prayojakatvājjñānabādhyatvaṃ na siddhamapi vyāpyatvāsiddhamapīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2622: sato vināśe caitanyasyāpi vināśaprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2628: nanu ca nehanānāstītipratipannopādhau śrautaniṣedhātmā bādhaḥ prapañce
GSP33nysu__1u:2634: kiṃ tvadabhimataṃ jñānabādhyatvamatra hetūkriyate kiṃ vāsmadabhimatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2638: hi yasmādanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānameva bādhastadviṣayatvameva tadbādhyatvaṃ matamasmākam
GSP33nysu__1u:2665: bādhyatvamiti prakṛtaprakṛtyarthaṃ bādhyaṃ taditi sāmānyena parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2671: rajatatvādinā vijñātasya purovartinaḥ śuktitvādinā vijñānaṃ khalvanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2672: evamasato rajatasya sattvādināvagatasyāsattvādinā vijñānamapyanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2673: samyagvijñānaṃ bādha ityevokte sarvamapi samyagjñānaṃ bādhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2676: anyathāvijñātasya jñānamityevokte dhārāvāhikabhrame rājatatvenāvagatasya śuktikāśakalasya punarnāgavaṅgatvādijñāne 'pi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2680: tena ghaṭasyaiva paṭādyapekṣayānyathā ghaṭatvena jñānasya punarghaṭatvena jñāne prasaṅgo nirastaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:2683: evamekenānyathāvijñātasya puruṣāntarasambandhini tasyaiva vā puruṣasya kālāntarabhāvinyājānasiddhe samyagvijñāne prasaṅgo 'pīti cenmaivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2716: tatra yāvatsu pakṣeṣu siddhāthartvaparyavasānaṃ tāvatsvanirvacanīyatvasya sattvāvirodhitvena na sanprapañcaḥ kintvanirvacanīya ityārambhāsaṅgatirdeṣo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2719: tatra sata eva sattvena pramitasyaiva viyadāderviśvasyāsadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2720: evamasata evāsattvena pramitasyaiva śuktirajatāderviśvasya sarvasyāpyāropitasya sadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2725: ato 'sambhavinā tena lakṣaṇenoktena kathaṃ te 'niṣyaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ na bhavedityādiyojanā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2726: bhedavādina ityanena māyāvādino viyadādau sadvailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāraḥ śuktirajatādau cāsadvilakṣaṇatvābhyupagatirāgrahamātramalaivetyabhipraiti yadyucyata ityatrāpyuktarītyāsambhavitvādikaṃ jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2734: sattvenāsattvena ca vicārāsahatvamanirvacanīyatvaṃ na punaḥ sattvāsattvadharmānadhikaraṇatvam
GSP33nysu__1u:2735: brahma tu sattvena vicārasahaṃ kathamanirvacanīyaṃ syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2737: kiñca yo viyadādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇyapi samāna iti kathaṃ na tasyānirvacanīyatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2745: tathāpi viyadādau nitye nityatvādeva śuktirajatādau cāsatvānna siddhamityavyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2746: yadi ca pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ tadapi viyadādau na siddhamityavyāptireva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2759: iha khalu kecidyathārthameva sarvavijñānamiti manyamānā nānyathākhyātiṃ sahante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2764: kiñca śuktikāyā rajatākārapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ sakāraṇa utākāraṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2771: duṣyakaraṇasaṃsargo heturiti cettathāpi kiṃ śuktitvāpagamena rajatarūpapariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2773: ādye puruṣāntareṇāpi tadā śuktitvaṃ na pratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2776: atha punaḥ śuktayākāreṇa rajataṃ pariṇatamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2789: saṃyogapradhvaṃsastu na kadāpi nivartate punaḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇo mukulībhāvastu śītādinodanajanya eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2793: kiñcotpannaṃ cedrajataṃ vinaṣṭaṃ tadā tathaiva pratītiḥ syāt na punarnedaṃ rajatamiti bādhabuddhiḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:2796: nahi mṛdo ghaṭākārapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ daṇḍacakrādikaṃ doṣatvena manyante
GSP33nysu__1u:2797: kiñca yasyāḥ pratītestadālambanaṃ tata eva tajjanma kiṃvā pratītyantarāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2800: utpanne hi rajate tadālambanāyāḥ pratīterjanma, tasyāṃ jātāyāṃ rajatotpattiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2820: tathā hi kiṃ vastuno vastvantarātmanā satī utāsatī /
GSP33nysu__1u:2852: yena yasyātiśaya utpadyate sa tasya viṣaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2853: atiśayo hi jñātatā vā syādvayavahāro vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2864: nahi rūpādijñānamutpādayaccakṣurākāśādinā na sannikṛṣṭata iti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2865: pratyabhijñā ca tattāsannikṛṣṭakaraṇajanyā na tadviṣayā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2871: tatra rajatajñāne śuktiravabhāsate na veti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2872: avabhāsata iti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2873: yadi saṃvidi bahumānavānneti brūyāttadā kathaṃ tacchuktikālambanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2874: kiñca rajatamavabhāsate śuktikālambanaṃ cedatiprasaṅgaḥ kataṃ pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2875: nanu rajatāvabhāsasya rajataviṣayakatve tena rajatena bhavitavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2888: na khalu jarāmaraṇavidhvaṃsaheturjātu sudhā taddheturapi bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2896: na khalu duṣyaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭaṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2900: kiñca pradarśitākāravyabhicāre pratyayasya sarvatra vyabhicāraśaṅkā durvārā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2902: tathāhi jñānameva khalu sarvatra vastuvyavasthāpakaṃ nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2908: naca vācyaṃ yathā ghaṭādeḥ pārthivasya vahnivyabhicāre 'pi na dhūmasyāpi tadvayabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2922: saṃvādakamapi jñānameveti tadapi kathaṃ saṃśayāspadaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2927: api ca pratīyamāno 'yaṃ rajatākāraḥ kutastya iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2940: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajatasmṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2942: tathāca rajatasmṛteḥ purovṛttigrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇātsannihitarajatajñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravataryataḥ kuta etaditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2957: naca dahanakāryaṃ kathaṃ doṣaḥ karotīti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2959: jāṭharāgnipariṇatā hi rasāḥ śarīropacayahetavo na bhasmakapariṇatāstathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2967: padātpadārthasmṛtau hariharādismṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñcānubhūtaṃ tāvanna samastaṃ smaryate
GSP33nysu__1u:2975: nanvevaṃ satyanāsvāditatiktasya śiśostiktasmaraṇānupapatteḥ kathaṃ tikto guḍa iti pratyaya iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2978: athavā nāyaṃ niyamo grahaṇasmaraṇe evāgṛhītaviveke vyavahārādipravartake iti kintu kvacidgrahaṇe eva mitho 'gṛhītabhede /
GSP33nysu__1u:2980: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya pītatvaṃ doṣavaśāddravyarahitaṃ gṛhyate
GSP33nysu__1u:2985: pittaṃ tu ājarvāvasthitaṃ kācamiva svacchaṃ na pratibandhakamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2994: tathāca tata eva sarvasyopapattau kiṃ viparyayakalpanayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2997: tadupapattau cāgṛhītavivekasya jñānadvayasya bhrāntitvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3001: nanvatra vigītapratyayo nāma kiṃ purovartinirvikalpakajñānamuta sadṛśadarśanotthaṃ rajarasmaraṇam
GSP33nysu__1u:3009: tathāstyeva ca tatsamutthaṃ savikalpakamidamiti vedanātsavivādabhedābhedaṃ rajatavedanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3010: tatra vipratipannau bhedābhedau vihāyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātramidaṃ rajatamityādisāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārakāraṇaṃ pakṣatvena vivakṣitaṃ cetko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3016: bhede hi vedanayoridaṃ vedanam purovatirmātragocaram na rajatavātā vetti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3017: rajatavedanamapi rajatamātragrāhi nedamiti purovartinamanūdya tasyaiva rajatatāmidaṃ rajatamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:3023: tato vipratipannākāraṃ parityajyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātrapakṣīkāre na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3024: kathamanyathākhyātivādīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya purovartiviṣayatvasādhanāya sādhanamupanyasyannito doṣādvimucyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3025: atha rajatāthirnaḥ śuktikāyāṃ pravṛttau hetubhūtaṃ jñānaṃ mayā pakṣīkriyata iti cenmoccairvāccaḥ paro 'pi śroṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3026: īśvarajñānena siddhasādhanatā syāditi cettavāpi bādhaḥ kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3027: prakṛtapravṛttiheturanīśvarajñānaṃ pakṣīkriyata iti cenmamāpi tathaiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3028: tvayeśvarānabhyupagamādvayarthaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti cettarhi māṃ prati tavāpi kathaṃ na vyartham
GSP33nysu__1u:3029: tathāpi vyāptijñāne siddhasādhanateti cettatraiva tava bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3034: kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma rajatasya jñānaṃ rajatajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3036: rajataśabdollekhijñānaṃ vā rajatārthinaḥ pravṛttihetujñānaṃ vā rajatamiti jñānaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3053: dvitīye rajatajñānaśabdena yo 'rthaḥ pareṇa vivakṣyate sa evāsmākaṃ heturbhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3054: tathā hi na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ pareṇāṅgīkartumucitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3062: yatra śuktikātadadhastadrajatamastīti vākyaṃ śrutavataḥ śuktijñānamapi rajatāthirpravṛttiheturbhavatīti tasyāpyanyathākhyātitāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3065: ato rajatajñānaṃ nāmoktapakṣeṣu kiñcidaṅgīkṛtya taddoṣo vā pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3068: kecitpunā rajataviṣayaṃ jñānamityeva hetvarthamupagamya rajatetarāviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamaṅgīkṛtya sādhyāviśiṣṭatādoṣaṃ pariharanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3089: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi kutaḥ sattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3093: khaṇḍo gauḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādayaḥ sarva eva savikalpakapratyayā vibhramāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33nysu__1u:3099: kiṃ guṇakriyājātyādeḥ dravyeṇota guṇādīnāmeva parasparamatha guṇāśrayasya kriyāśrayeṇetyādi
GSP33nysu__1u:3102: na hi śuklaḥ paṭa ityasya śauklayaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimato laukikānām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3103: naca calati paṭa ityasya calanaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3104: nāpi khaṇḍo gaurityetatkhaṇḍatvaṃ gotvaṃ ca piṇḍa evetyanena samānārtham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3106: daṇḍīti śābdavyavahāre bhedārthapratyayaprayogājjñānamapi tādṛśaṃ kalpyata iti cetsamamatrāpi
GSP33nysu__1u:3110: ata eva śuklaḥ paṭa ityuktvā śauklayaṃ paṭasyeti vyākartāro bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3112: na hi śuklaḥ paṭaścalatītyasya śauklayaṃ paṭatvaṃ calanaṃ caikamityarthaścetasi cakāsti pratipattṛṇām
GSP33nysu__1u:3113: tathā sati daṇḍī kuṇḍalī devadatta ityasyāpi jñānasya daṇḍakuṇḍaladevadattatvatādātmyaviṣayatāpātāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3115: samānamekamadhikaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te hi samānādhikaraṇāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3116: tathāca guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇāṃ cābhedaḥ sphuṭa eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3123: evañca yatra bhedo na tadabhedena pratibhāsate yaccābhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bheda iti kvātivyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3124: nanu guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ cābhedo bhagavato muneḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3127: tathāca punaḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādipratyayā vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3132: yadvijñānaṃ yatsannikṛṣṭakaraṇena janyate sa tasya viṣaya ityaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3135: nahi cakṣurāderākāśādisannikarṣo rūpādijñānakāraṇam, nāpi vākyasyākāśādisannikarṣo vākyārthajñāne hetuḥ, naca liṅgajñānasyātmanā sannikarṣo liṅgijñānanimittam, kiṃ nāmāvarjanīyasannidhayaste sannikarṣāḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3136: liṅgasya sādhyadharmisannikarṣo liṅgijñānakāraṇamiti cenna liṅgajñānasya karaṇatayābhyupagamāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3139: tathāpi pratyabhijñāyāṃ tattāṃśena cakṣurāderliṅginā ca liṅgajñānasya vākyārthena vākyajñānasya sannikarṣābhāvādaviṣayatāpattiriti cenna asannikṛṣṭajñāpane 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3142: saṃsargadharmakapadārthavācipadasamudāyarūpavākyaviṣayajñānena vākyārthajñānaṃ janyate, ato nātiprasaṅga iti cettarhyabhyupagataḥ sannikarṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3143: nahi saṃyogādireva sannikarṣaḥ kiṃ nāma pratyāsattimātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:3149: tarhi manaḥsannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānaṃ rūpajñānaṃ manoviṣayamāpannamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3154: na caivaṃ satyanubhavavirodhaḥ, rajatāvabhāsasya śuktikāsannikṛṣṭakaraṇajanyatvena tadviṣayatvopapatteḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3158: astu vā yadvijñānaṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ tattadviṣayamityeva vyavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3162: nahi vayamasminpratyaye śuktitvamāvabhāsata iti brūmo yena virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3165: virodhe vā samīcīnarajata idaṃ rajatamiti pratītirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3167: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi jñānaviṣayatā prasajyata iti cet satyam,
GSP33nysu__1u:3173: vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kuto bādha ityasato rajatatādātmyorjñānaviṣayatāmācāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3178: ādye paśuhiṃsā kiṃ dharmajanane svārasikaśaktimatī utādharmajanana iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3179: ādye kataṃ kratubāhyāpi dharmaṃ na janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3181: sahakārivaśāditi cet aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi sahakāriṇāṃ svārasikaśaktipratibandhena viparītaśaktayādhāyakatvam
GSP33nysu__1u:3186: nacaivaṃ bharjitā(tāḥ)kuṭajadhānā vaṭāṅkuraṃ kuto na janaya(yaṃ)tīti
GSP33nysu__1u:3189: kecitsahajaśaktipratibandhena viparītamapi śaktimādadhati, yathā viṣasya mārakatvaśaktiṃ pratibaddhayārogyādi(janana)śaktimādadhānāḥ padārthāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3190: guṇā eva na te doṣā iti cet kācādayo 'pi guṇā eva na te doṣā ityuktameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3195: tathā satīśvarajñānasya nityasyārtho viṣayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3196: pratyabhijñānasya ca tattāṃśo viṣayo na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3202: tatra vyāvartakaṃ kadācidasti rajatādikaṃ kadāpi nāstīti vaiṣamyamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3203: tatkiṃ yadākadācitsataḥ kāraṇatvaṃ pūrvakṣaṇe sato vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3207: atha nātītādirarthaḥ svasāmarthyenānumityādikaṃ vyāvartayati yena tatsattāpekṣā syāt, kintu svahetusāmarthyādarthavyāvṛttaṃ jñānamutpadyata
GSP33nysu__1u:3210: kiñca satyasthale 'pi na sākṣātsākṣātkāraṃ prati kāraṇatvamarthasya kintvindriyasannikarṣasyaiva
GSP33nysu__1u:3211: saca yatrāsatā nopapadyate tatrārthasattāmapekṣata iti pāramparyeṇaivārthasya kāraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3212: nanu tarhyasatā rajatādinā sannikarṣāyogātkathamindriyeṇa tajjñānajanmeti cenna, śuktikāsannikṛṣṭaṃ duṣyamindriyaṃ tāmevātyantāsadrajatātmanāvagāhamānaṃ jñānaṃ janayatītyaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3214: yāvatkhalu vigīte pratyaye bhāsate tasya sarvasyāsattve 'satkhyātiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3216: yaccoktaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre jñānasya savartrānāśvāsa iti tat autsargikaṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyamapavādādviparyaya iti vadatā'cāryeṇaiva parihariṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3217: sākṣī khalu caitanyarūpo niyatayāthārthyaḥ kadācidapi saṃśayānāskandito
GSP33nysu__1u:3220: ata evānāśvāsanirasanopāyo na jñāneṣu kaścidviśeṣo 'stīti nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3221: anyathā parasyāpi kathaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre vyavahṛtervyavahārāntare samāśvāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3223: kvacidvivekāgrahe ca kathamanyatra viśiṣṭapratyaye viśvāso bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3227: bādhakābhāvādinā viśiṣṭajñānasvarūpaniścayamaṅgīkurvāṇaḥ kathaṃ svaprakāśavijñānavādaṃ na jahyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3234: yā caivaṃ prakriyā rajatamidamityādinoktā sā jñānadvitve rajatajñānasya ca smṛtitve pramāṇābhāvādanupapannā
GSP33nysu__1u:3240: rajatajñānavata evotpadyamānatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti cenna tathāpi rajatasaṃskāravyavahārādau vyabhicārāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3246: kiñcedaṃ smaraṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ na tāvatsāmānyaṃ guṇeṣu prābhākarairabhyupagatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3263: anyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkita iti cenna tathāpi sandigdhakālātītatānistārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3267: asati bādhake na vṛthānyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkayata iti cet samaṃ prakṛte 'pīti
GSP33nysu__1u:3274: nedaṃ smṛtiriti vyavahartavyaṃ tattollekhādismṛticinhavikalatvāditi prathamaprayoge vivakṣitatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3276: yadapi viparyayābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuktaṃ tat vivekāgrahamātreṇa pravṛttyāderupapattau tathāstu /
GSP33nysu__1u:3281: naca tena vinaikatvādipratyayopapattiriti cet viparyaye 'pyevamiti kuto gauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3284: (ta) yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatamidamiti viśiṣṭaviṣayamekameva
GSP33nysu__1u:3285: vijñānaṃ svaprakāśatayā vā mānasapratyakṣatayā vā sākṣiṇā vāvabhāsate tathedamapīti kuto 'sya na viśiṣṭaviṣayaikajñānatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3286: na hi tato 'sya mātrayāpi viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3288: kevalamekaṃ tādṛgviṣayasadbhāvādyathārthaṃ tadabhāvāparamayathārthamaviśiṣṭaviṣayamanekamapi tadviśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvena pratibhāsata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3290: nāstyeva viśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvagrāhipratyaya iti cenna anubhavasiddhajñānāpalāpe smṛtyanubhavasvarūpāpalāpaprasaṅgāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3294: kiṃ svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam utānyonyābhāvaḥ athavāvaidharmyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3308: rajatāsambhavinaḥ purovartinīdantvasya purovartyasambhavinaśca rajate rajatatvasya gṛhītatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3311: sa cedaṃrajatatvayoḥ svarūpameva pareṣām iti kathaṃ tadavabhāse nāvabhāseta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3315: atha manyase purovatirno yaḥ śuktitvādidharmo rajatavyāvartako yaśca rajate vyavahitadeśatvādidharmaḥ purovartivyāvartakastayoragrahaṇaṃ pravartakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3317: purovartino hi śuktitvāgrahe na śuktikārthī tatra pravarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3318: rajatasya cāsannihitatvādidharmāgrahe rajatārthī na tatra pravartatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3328: asti tāvatpravartakatvābhimatapratyaye 'pyapekṣitopāyapurovṛttyavagamāṃśayoḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedavirahādeva bhedāgrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3334: kiñca pravartakasādṛśyātpravṛttirityatraiva kalpyate uta yadyatsadṛśaṃ tattatkāryakārīti sarvatra niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3337: pravṛttilobhāditthamāsthīyata iti cenna tasyā viparyayāṅgīkārādeva suvyavasthiteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3340: nanvidaṃ rajatamiti yathā rajatasādhyā buddhī rajatasadṛśācchuktiśakalādbhavati bhavatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3345: api cedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravartakasādṛśyamātrādyadi pravṛttimupajanayennivṛttimapi kutā ena janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3347: nanu ca yathā bhedāgraho bhavatāmabhedagrahaṃ janayati tathā pravṛttimapi kiṃ na janayediti
GSP33nysu__1u:3350: jñānajanane hi kāraṇānāṃ svātantṛyaṃ na puruṣasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:3353: pravṛttau tu puruṣa eva svatantro na jñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3354: sa hi satyapi jñāne 'pekṣita eva pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3359: kiñca jñānamarthe pravṛttiṃ kiṃ sākṣādupajanayati utecchāprayatnadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:3363: purovartipravṛtterhi sākṣātkāraṇaṃ prayatnaḥ, tasya cecchā, tasyāśca samīhitasādhanatānumānam
GSP33nysu__1u:3366: atha rajate pratipannena rajatatvena tatsamīhitasādhanatājñānamupajātaṃ bhedāgraha(bhedagrahe
GSP33nysu__1u:3376: naca tatra saṃsargagrahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyo hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3381: avisaṃvādivyavahārajanakatvaviśiṣṭasākāṃkṣarūparūpisahopalambho hi talliṅgam na cāvisaṃvāditvaṃ prāk pravṛtteḥ śakyādhigamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3382: asti cedaṃ sakalamapi pravartakaṃ vibhrame 'pīti kuto viparyayābhāve pravṛttyanupapattiḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3386: rajatatvena sahāgṛhītāsaṃsargatayā vā rajatādagṛhītabhedatayā vā samīhitasādhanatānumānopapatteriti etadapyayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3391: nirvikalpake tu vastusvarūpamātramiti bheda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3398: ata tadvastudarśanasāpekṣadaśarnaṃ nirvikalpake 'cakāsadapi savikalpake bhātīti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3401: kiñcāsaṃsargāgrahādeva sarvatra pravṛttyaṅgīkāre madhyamavṛddhapravṛtterapi tathātvena bālasya tadīyasaṃsargajñānānumānopāyābhāvāt padānāmanvitārtheṣu vyutpattyanupapattau śābdapramāṇocchedaprasaṅgaḥ athaivaṃ manyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3405: tatra kiṃ tadanvayajñānaṃ pravṛttau niyatamutāniyatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3406: ādye 'stu tatpravṛttāvupayogi mā vā bhūt, anyathākhyātiṃ vinā na
GSP33nysu__1u:3413: vyavahāro hi vyavahartavyopalambhanibandhano yuktaḥ, na tu vyavaharaṇīyaviparyayānupalabdhinibandhanaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3416: purovarti vā rajatajñānagocaro rajatajñānagocaro rajatānupāyatve sati tadarthipravṛttiviṣayatvātsamyagrajatavat
GSP33nysu__1u:3417: vivādapadaṃ rajatajñānamidaṃ jñānānna bhidyate prakāśamānāttato 'prakāśamānabhedatve sati prakāśamānatvātsampratipannarajatajñānavadityādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3418: kiñca viparyayābhāve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya bādhakatvamanupapadyamānaṃ taṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3424: naca vyavahārapratibandhakatvena, avivekanivṛttau kāraṇābhāvādeva vyavahārānupapatteḥ pratibandhakakalpanāyogāt, vyāghracorādijñānasya bādhakatāpatteśca /
GSP33nysu__1u:3430: anyathā vimato vyavahāro yathārtho vyavahāratvāt, rajataviṣayo vā rajatavyavahāratvādityapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3431: yadapi jñānatvaṃ ca yathārthamātravṛttītyādi, tatra kimidaṃ jñānatvaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:3443: meruḥ sarṣapa ityādivāyānmerorapi sarṣapatvena pratibhāsāddṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavaikalyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3444: anyathā tathāvidhavākyābhāsaṃ śrutavatā tatpratiṣedho na kriyetāprasaktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3446: api caivaṃ satyagniranuguṇa iti bādhitaviṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacatītyapārthakādbhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3458: [= vol. 2, pp. 269-800, and vol. 3, pp. 1-38 of Pandurangi's edition]
GSP33nysu__1u:3461: anyathā śvetaketūddālakākhyāyikayā pratipāditatvādadvaitamapi na śrutyabhiprāyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3462: “taddhaitatpaśyan ṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipedehaṃ brahmāsmi'; ityapi paropāsanānuvādo na svārthe tātparyavān syāt”atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste';
GSP33nysu__1u:3467: yata evaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ svalakṣaṇamatra sūtre brahmaṇo
GSP33nysu__1u:3470: ato jīvaikyamapi sa nirācakre jagadguruḥ // MAnuv_1,1.99ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3477: syādayamadvaitināmanupapanno lakṣaṇārambho yadīdaṃ jīvavyāvṛttyarthaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3478: jaḍamātravyāvṛttyarthaṃ tu lakṣaṇe vyākhyāyamāne kathaṃ jīvaikyavādināṃ lakṣaṇasūtrārambho 'nupapanna ityata āha- nahīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3479: nahi janmādihetutvaṃ jīvasya jagato bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.99cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3480: yatra hi lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatsarvaṃ tadvayāvartyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3484: kiñcānena lakṣaṇena yadi jīvo na vyāvartyate, kintu so 'pi lakṣyāntargataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3488: kathañcicchaṅkāyāṃ vā tasyāpi lakṣyatvāṅgīkāraṃ parityajya tatra na lakṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ kriyata ityāśavānāha- hitākriyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3489: hitākriyādidoṣaṃ ca vakṣyatyeva svayaṃ prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,1.100ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3491: yathā'ha”sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktiṃ vihāyānyataḥ paraparikalpitātpradhānāderacetanāccetanādapi paricchinnajñānakriyāśakteḥ saṃsāriṇo hiraṇyagarbhādutpattyādi na sambhāvayitumapi śakyate'; iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3496: nirguṇatvaṃ ca tenaiva niṣiddhaṃ prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_1,1.100cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3501: nirviśeṣatvavādināṃ ca nirviśeṣatvaṃ niṣedhataḥ sūtrasyārambhaḥ kathamupapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3506: nahi tathāvidhaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ vā viruṇaddhi
GSP33nysu__1u:3510: su samyak svarūpāntargatyā na lakṣaṇānīti vā tadarthopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3511: tarhi yato 'sya janmādi sā māyā tadāśrayo brahmeti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3515: nanu taṭasthenāpi jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena brahmaṇo jīvaikyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ ca (ni)viruddhayate
GSP33nysu__1u:3519: tatra kākādhikaraṇatvaṃ tadanadhikaraṇebhyo gṛhaṃ vyāvartayati na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3521: ādye brahmalakṣaṇamapi kathaṃ na jīvavyāvṛttiṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3522: kathaṃ ca tatsambandhena saguṇaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3524: yo hi kāryakāraṇasaṅghātādaviviktaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargiṇamātmānaṃ matvā kliśyati sa jīvo vyāvartyata eva te(ane)na lakṣaṇena /
GSP33nysu__1u:3525: tatra yaścaitanyadhātuḥ sa brahmaṇo na bhidyata ityabhyupagame virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3526: naca satyasya prapañcasya kāraṇabhūtāyāḥ satyāyā māyāyā āśrayo brahmeti sūtrārtho yena brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3527: kintu yadavaṣṭambho viśvo vivartaḥ prapañcastad brahmeti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3528: sati caivaṃ sūtrārthe kathaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ ca viruddhayata iti
GSP33nysu__1u:3531: āstāṃ tāvat(eṣā) prapañcasya vivartatā'divārtā pramāṇābhāvāt prakṛtyadhikaraṇe nirākariṣyamāṇatvācca
GSP33nysu__1u:3532: taṭasthena jagajjanmādikāraṇatvenātra sūtre lakṣaṇayā brahma pratipādyata iti kuto 'ṅgīkaraṇīyam
GSP33nysu__1u:3534: na tāvad brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya bādhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadagocaratvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3541: janmādyasya yatastad brahmeti lakṣaṇayocyata iti kalpyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3543: bhedenaiva tu mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kutaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.101ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3544: yadi jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaparirakṣaṇāya yathāśrutaṃ sūtrārthaṃ parityajya lakṣaṇāśrīyate tarhi jīvabrahmaṇorbhedenaivāṅgīkṛtena sūtrasya mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kasmādāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3545: nanvabhedamupādāya sūtre lakṣaṇā vā'śrayaṇīyā bhedamupādāya makhyavṛttirveti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3546: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ dvitīyaḥ pakṣa eva śreyāniti, aprāmāṇikaparirakṣaṇāya vākyānāṃ jaghanyavṛttirāśrīyamāṇā kvaci(dupalabdheti)dapi dṛṣṭeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3552: tacchabdenā(bdasya) mukhyārtho yaḥ,”sadeva somya'; ityādinā prakṛtaḥ prekṣāpūrvaṃ tejo 'bannādīnāṃ sraṣṭā sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ mūlamāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhā ca sakalāvadyagandhavidhuro 'paricchinnaguṇākaraḥ paramātmā,
GSP33nysu__1u:3553: yaśca tvaṃpadamukhyārthaḥ pratyakṣa(ādi)siddho 'lpaśaktiḥ parādhīno doṣakaluṣito 'vacchinnajñānādiguṇaḥ, tāvupādāyānena vākyenaikyamucyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:3561: nanu kiṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ mukhyamupādāya tattvaṃpadayorlākṣaṇikatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3562: kiṃvā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ gauṇaṃ gṛhītvā tattvaṃpadayormukhyārthatā vyākhyātavyeti sandehe na vinigamanāyāṃ heturasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3567: kiñca virodhyākāraparityāgena svarūpamātralakṣaṇayā”tattvamasi'; iti vākyaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ pratipādayatītyatra virodhyākāraparityāgo nāma
GSP33nysu__1u:3576: nanu ca virodhyākāraparityāgena jīvasya brahmaikyamityasyārtho na virodhyākārāvivakṣāmātreṇeti nāpyanityatveneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3583: sadaiva guṇavattve 'sya bhinnaṃ syānnirguṇaṃ sadā // MAnuv_1,1.102ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3584: yadi nirguṇaṃ saguṇādatyantabhinnaṃ tarhyasya saguṇasya nityaṃ saguṇatvāttasmānnityameva nirguṇaṃ bhinnaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3588: āropapravāhasya cānādinityatayā sadā saguṇatvaṃ ca nāniṣyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3591: yathā vā yadidaṃ rajataṃ sā śuktirityevaṃ pareṇa svābhisandhāvudghāṭite satyāha- naceti
GSP33nysu__1u:3598: ato guṇarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ na sarvathā śakyanirūpaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3606: nanu (ca)”sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaśca'; iti nirguṇaṃ brahma śrūyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3613: evaṃ dharmarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ nirākṛtamapyāgrahamātreṇa yo 'ṅgīkaroti taṃ prati solluṇṭhamāha- nirguṇatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3614: nirguṇatvaṃ tadā ca syādāsuratvaṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_1,1.103ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3615: tadā ca yuktayā nirgu(ṇe)ṇatve nirākṛte 'pi yadi nirguṇatvaṃ parasmai
GSP33nysu__1u:3620: nahi nānāvidhakāryakriyāveśātmatvaṃ tatprasavaśaktayatmakaṃ vā jijñāsyaviśuddhabrahmāntargataṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3630: yadatra jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ mu(khya)khato lakṣaṇamabhihitaṃ savarjñatvādisamastaguṇavattvaṃ cābhiprāyavyā(prā)ptamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3631: tadubhayamapi lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyādbrahmaṇo bhinnamabhinnaṃ bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3639: tathāca”yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante'; ityādiśruteḥ punaruktidoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3642: naca tadeva tadaiva prasiddhamaprasiddhaṃ ceti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3658: tatra jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣasya sadbhāvāttadbalena sarvamutpadyata iti vaktuṃ nirbhedavastuni pareṇa viśeṣasyānaṅgīkṛtatvāt ghaṭādīnāṃ ca mithyātvenāṅgīkṛtānāmanudāharaṇatvātsatya eva vastunyasāvudapapādanīya iti manvāna āha- tadeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3660: yadyevaṃ pṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayasi tadaikyasya gatirnirūpaṇaprakāro na vidyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3671: tattvamasītyādivākyapratipādyamaikyaṃ kiṃ tatpadalakṣitāccaitanyādabhinnamuta bhinnamatha bhinnābhinnamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3672: pareṇāṅgīkṛtatvena prādhānyādabhedapakṣaṃ tāvadādau nirākaroti- aikyābheda iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3673: aikyābhede na śāstreṇa jñeyaṃ tat svaprakāśataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.104cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3674: aikyasya caitanyasvarūpābhede 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe tadaikyaṃ tattvamasītyādinā śāstreṇa pratipādyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3681: atha śāstraṃ naikyaṃ pratipādayati kintu bhedabhramaṃ nirākaroti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3704: nanu kathaṃ tarhi so 'yaṃ devadatta iti vākyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3706: bhede mithyātvato bhedasatyatvaṃ syād balādapi // MAnuv_1,1.105ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3717: nanu na kutrāpi satayo bhedo 'smābhirabhyupeyate tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3720: yayordūrasthayorvanaspatyoraikyaṃ mithyā tayorbhedaḥ satya iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3721: athavā yasya svarūpeṇa sato yo 'bhāvo mithyā tasya tadviparītaḥ satyo yathā brahmaṇo 'nṛtatvādermithyātve satyatvādikaṃ satyamiti sāmānyavyāptyāśrayaṇena prasaṅgopapattiḥ yathāhuḥ”parasparavirodhe tu na prakārāntarasthitiḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3725: tadā vaktavyaṃ tau kiṃ caitanyādabhinnāvuta bhinnau atha bhinnābhinnāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3731: sa bhedaḥ kiṃ bhedibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno bhinnābhinno vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3736: nanu bhedasya bhedāntaraṃ bhedābhedayośca bhedābhedāntaramityetāvatā nānavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3740: yadyapi bhedābhedāṅgīkāre virodho vaktuṃ śakyate tathāpi sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3750: tadā pṛcchāmaḥ svasya nirvāhakaṃ hi svanirvāhakaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ svanirvāhakatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3753: tathā caikasyaivaikasyāmeva nirvāhakriyāyāṃ karmakartṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3754: tannirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca parasparaṃ dharmiṇā kriyayā
GSP33nysu__1u:3757: paryāyo bhedavān vā syādanavasthobhayatra ca // MAnuv_1,1.106b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:3758: nirvāhyamiti nirvāhakamiti apiśabdānnirvāhakamityapi śabdasamūhaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta ekārthatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3762: yadi nirvāhyatvādirarthaḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇā na bhedavān syāttadā tadbhedadvayasya bhedisvarūpamātratve paryāyatvādidoṣaprasaṅgādbhedāntaravadityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3763: tathāca parasparaṃ bhedaṃ dharmibhedaṃ vā'śrityobhayatrānavasthā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3769: satyajñānādikaṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantābhinnaṃ vā bhinnaṃ vā bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3780: nanu satyajñānādīnāṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantamabheda eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3783: parāparasāmānyavācināṃ saguṇabrahmavācināṃ vā teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi lakṣaṇayā pravṛttyaṅgīkārāt
GSP33nysu__1u:3784: naca vācyaṃ satyapadena lakṣitasyaiva jñānapadena lakṣaṇāyāṃ vaiyarthyāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3796: brahmaviśeṣaṇatvenāsatyatvādivyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ satyādipadānāṃ tvayā vaktuṃ na śakyate
GSP33nysu__1u:3804: mumukṣuṇā brahma vā taddharmo vā jijñāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3813: vyāvṛttasya brahmaṇo 'viśeṣatve 'ṅgīkṛte sati, viśeṣaṇābhidhānamukhena vyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3816: asatyatvādivyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3817: nahi tīre nadītvamanabhidadhato nadīpadasyānadītvavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3821: nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśamāne virodhyākārāropa evānupapanna iti coktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3824: tattasmādakhaṇḍaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ vākyadvayapratipādyamityetanmataṃ khaṇḍitaṃ dūṣitaṃ veditavyamityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3832: viśeṣābhāvo hi nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti vākyena pratipādayitumiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3834: ayamapi viśeṣo nirviśeṣamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3862: yato bhedahīne 'pi vastunyasti kaścicchaktiviśeṣo yena prakāśamānamapi na prakāśata ityādi yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3863: sa ca viśeṣo 'nayaivārthāpattyāvagamyata ityeva tvayā vaktavyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3865: so 'pi hi viśeṣo yadi vastuno bhinnastarhi bhedānavasthādi doṣaḥ syādabhinnatve ca viśeṣatadvadbhāvānupapattestādavasthyādityata
GSP33nysu__1u:3871: sa eva viśeṣo viśeṣāntaramantareṇa viśeṣatadvadbhāvaṃ ca ghaṭayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3872: ekasyaiva nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca tadbalādeva siddhayatītyaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3873: nanvabhinne vastuni bhedakāryanirvāhakatvaṃ viśeṣasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt(taḥ)
GSP33nysu__1u:3884: etadubhayānyathānupapattyā bhedarahite 'pi caitanye bhedrapratinidhistatkāyarkārī kaścidatiśayo 'stīti kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3886: tathācārthāpattyā svarūpagrāhiṇyā bhedakāryanirvāhaka eva(ca)asau siddha iti kiṃ tatra pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇeneti
GSP33nysu__1u:3894: tathā hi paṭastacchauklayaṃ ca tāvanna bhidyete /
GSP33nysu__1u:3900: nāpi kuṇḍamiva paṭo 'dhikaraṇatvena badarāṇīva śauklayamādheyatvena parisphurati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3912: śuklamānayetyukte niyamena paṭasyānayanam, apaṭaḥ paṭa itivadaśuklaḥ paṭa
GSP33nysu__1u:3920: kaścidatiśayo bhedapratinidhiryadvaśādidaṃ sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ syādityeva kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3923: nanu bhedābhedāṅgīkāreṇānupapatteḥ śamanāt kiṃ viśeṣeṇeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3930: nanu sarvavastuṣu yadyasti viśeṣaḥ, sa ca vastuno na bhidyate, prāptaṃ tarhi sakalavastūnāmaikyamityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3933: te prakṛtasvarūpā viśeṣā aśeṣato vastuṣvananteṣu dravyeṣvanantā eva santi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3936: nanvekaikasmiṃśca dravye viśeṣo 'pyekaiko 'sti tadā paṭo mahāṃśchuklaścalatīti vicitrānekavyavahārānupapattiḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3939: tataśca viśeṣāṅgīkāro vyarthaḥ syādityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3940: te 'pyuktalakṣaṇā viśeṣā aśeṣato 'pi vastuṣu pratyekamanantāḥ santyato
GSP33nysu__1u:3942: yatra yāvanto vyavahārāstatra tāvanto viśeṣā iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3945: tathāca bhinnanāṃ dravyābhede dravyasyāpi bhedaprasaṅga ityata āha-
GSP33nysu__1u:3952: sarvaṃ caitadviśeṣasvarūpasādhakārthāpattyaiva siddhamiti na pṛthak pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3958: tathāpi vipratipanno na tanmātreṇa bodhayituṃ śakyata ityarthāpattirupanyasteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3963: yatpareṇa pṛṣṭaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇayorbheda ityādi tasyedamuttaram- brahma nirbhedamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3967: brahmaṇaścaikatvam, anantā guṇā asyeti guṇaguṇyādibhāvo, brahma ca guṇāścetyapunaruktabhaṇanaṃ ca yujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3971: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya svalakṣaṇatve bādhakābhāvānna taṭasthatvakalpanaṃ yuktamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3976: yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyo nirākariṣyata iti nāṅgīkārārhastadā guṇaguṇinoreva sa kaścittādṛśaḥ svabhāvabheda ityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3977: nahi paṭādau bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣabalādvayavahāraviśeṣadarśanamātreṇa brahmaṇyapi tathā kalpayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3984: na punaḥ sambhāvanaivārtha(sya)sādhiketyata āha- evaṃ dharmāniti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3991: mūlaśrutyaṅgīkāre saiva viśeṣābhidhātrī bhaviṣyatīti pramitametannirbhedameva brahma viśeṣabalādeva nānāvyavahārālambanamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3992: atra yatpareṇa jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇo nimittatvamevotopādānatvamevāthobhayamapīti vimṛśya tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:3997: tasmāduktalakṣaṇadvayopapannaṃ brahma nārāyaṇākhyaṃ mumukṣuṇā jijñāsyamiti sthitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4004: tasya harahiraṇyagarbhādicetaneṣu pradhānādyacetaneṣu ca pāśupatādyāgamānumānāvaṣṭambhenātivyāptimāśaṅkyātra pariharati bhagavāntsūtrakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4026: aparastu saṅkalpavargādyapratyakṣaphalāni vidadhānaḥ śivasya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasarvajñatvasavarśaktitvasatyasaṅkalpatvādyaśeṣaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ niravadyatvaṃ ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4034: tataśca tatpraṇetuḥ śivasya paramāptatvamavadhārya taddṛṣṭāntena tatpraṇītasya dvitīyasyāpyāgamasya prāmāṇyamavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4041: anayaiva diśā tattadāgamaprāmāṇyaṃ tattaddevatāvādināṃ pratyavasthānāni draṣṭavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:4047: vipratipanne pṛthivyudake, prayatnavatā dhṛte, gurutve satyapātitvāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:4050: ityādibhiranumānairviśvodayasthitilayakartari sāmānyataḥ siddhe asmadādīnāṃ tadasambhavāt bhagavāṃśchiva eva pariśeṣājjagajjanmādikartā siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4051: yathā ca (vi)citrādikāryadaśarnāttadanuguṇa eva kartā kalpyate evaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:4052: vicitrānekakāryadaśarnāt(nena) kalpyamāno 'pi kartā tadanuguṇaḥ sārvajñādimāneva siddhayati
GSP33nysu__1u:4053: athavā kṣityādikaṃ kartetyadantargatameva savarjñatvādikaṃ na yatnāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4061: ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvāścetyādinoktaṃ śāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇamabhivyañjakaṃ pramāṇamasyeti śāstrayoni tasya bhāvaḥ śāstrayonitvaṃ tasmāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4063: jagajjanmādikāraṇasya vastuno vedādiśāstraikasamadhigamyatvena śaivādyāgamānumānāgocaratvānna tairanyeṣāṃ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4064: kintu śāstraṃ yasya jagatkāraṇatvamācaṣṭe sa eva tathābhyupagantavya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4066: yadi śāstraikasamadhigamyatvaṃ sautro hetuḥ siddhaḥ syānna caivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4067: pratyakṣāgamyatve 'pi śaivādyāgamairanumānaiścoktavidhayā jagatkāraṇatvasya niścetuṃ śakyatvāt, ityāśaṅkaya sautrahetusiddhaye śaivādyāgamagamyatvaṃ tāvannirācikīrṣustatprāmāṇyasādhakaṃ paropanyastamanumānamapākaroti- iti cediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4075: yadi pratyakṣasaṃvādena dṛṣṭārthānāṃ śivādivākyānāṃ prāmāṇyamanumāya taddṛṣṭāntenādṛṣṭārthānāmapi śivādivākyatvena hetunā prāmāṇyamanumīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:4076: tarhi dṛṣṭārtheṣveva vākyeṣu yatpratyakṣata eva phalavyabhicāravaddṛśyate
GSP33nysu__1u:4079: taddṛṣṭāntena śivādivākyatvādihetunaivādṛṣṭārthānāmapi, vimatānyapramāṇāni śivādivākyatvāt sampratipannavadityaprāmāṇyamanumātuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4080: na hi dṛṣṭārthaṃ sarvameva śivavākyaṃ samarthapravṛttijanakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4083: phalavyabhicārastu kartṛkarmādivaiguṇyanimitta iti cettarhi tadapi vākyamapramāṇameva phalasaṃvāsadastu kākatālīyo vā jagadvayāmohakānāṃ śivādīnāṃ guḍajihvikā vetyastu /
GSP33nysu__1u:4084: prāmāṇye hi sudṛḍhanirūḍhe vyabhicārasya kartrādivaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4088: kiñca yaḥ śivāgamasyādṛṣṭārthasyāpyevaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manyate sa hiraṇyagarbhādyāgamānāmapi prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4110: īśvare jagatkāraṇe pṛthak svatantrānumā ca na mānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4112: yattāvatsāmānyato jagatkartṛtvasiddhāvanumānam tatra kiṃ kāraṇādisākṣātkāravatkartṛpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4119: kathañcidasya hetuviśeṣaṇatve sādhanavaikalyaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4138: tarhyutpattyanantarameva kiṃ na kuryāditi cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4149: kiñca yasya kāryatvamātre('pi) vipratipattiḥ sa kathaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:4152: anyathā kathaṃ bhūtale ghaṭabhāvābhāvau yugapatsambhavata itrata cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4154: kathamanyathā (gagane) pakṣiṇo bhāvābhāvau yugapaditi tatrāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4157: khananādinā yeṣāṃ vibhāgo nodanādinā ca yeṣāṃ saṃyogaste kṣityādīnāmavayavāḥ pratyakṣasiddhā iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:4158: tatkiṃ saṃyogavibhāgisajatīyadravyāntaravattvaṃ sāvayavatvamityuktaṃ bhavati uta tadārabdhatvam
GSP33nysu__1u:4175: anayaiva diśā sarvāṇi jagatkāraṇamātrasādhanāni svatantratānumānāni nirasanīyāni(iti) /
GSP33nysu__1u:4176: yacca śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatve pariśeṣānumānaṃ tadapi kiṃ śāstrānusāri kiṃvā kevalam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4180: īśvare śive jagatkartari ca pṛthaganumānaṃ na mānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4185: evakāro na dūṣaṇāntarānveṣaṇena vṛthā manaḥ khedanīyaṃ sphuṭadoṣe satīti dyotayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4186: īśvaravākyatvaṃ kathamatra hetuḥ syādityata āha- puṃstveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4192: atha pariśeṣato jagatkartṛtvaṃ tasminnanumimānasya tavāpi kutaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4197: nanu jakatkāraṇatvaṃ śivaniṣṭhamanyatrānupapattau satyāṃ kiñcinniṣṭhatayā pramitatvāditi hi pariśeṣānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4205: kimato yadyevamiti cet, siddhaḥ sautraheturityāha- śāstrayonitvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4212: tarko jñāpayituṃ śakto neśitāraṃ kathañcana // MAnuv_1,1.115 //
GSP33nysu__1u:4215: “nendriyāṇi nānumānaṃ vedā hyevainaṃ vedayanti'; ityādivākyataḥ, iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4222: kiñcijjñānaṃ hi puṃstvena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ sukham // MAnuv_1,1.116 //
GSP33nysu__1u:4227: tatkathamucyate īśituḥ kiñcijjñatvaṃ ca puṃstvena sādhayituṃ śakyaṃ hīti tatrāha- sukhamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:4229: prasiddhakartṛrahitaṃ vanaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityādinā yo vanādikartā siddhaḥ tenaivākāreṇa taṃ pakṣīkṛtya prayoge na ko 'pi doṣa ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4233: sa evakṣityādikarteti kathaṃ na sārvajñyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4235: nahi kāryatvādihetuḥ kartāramiva tasya sarvatraikatvaṃ gamayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4238: loke hi gajagavayagardabhādīnāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca nirmātāro vijātīyā evopalabhyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:4239: naca vanakartā kiñcijjña iti sādhane kimīśvarasyeti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4244: vṛkṣakṛnnākhilaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vetti puṃstvāddhi caitravat // MAnuv_1,1.117ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:4251: nahi yo yatkartā sa sakalaṃ tajjānātīti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4254: anenaiva nyāyena sarvatra pratipakṣasambhavāt satyasaṅkalpatvāśarīritvanityajñānecchāprayatnatvaduḥkhādirāhityādikamapi nānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyamityāśayavānāha- ityādīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4263: vastutvāt turagaḥ śṛṅgī puṣpavat khaṃ sutairyutā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4264: citriṇī ca rasaḥ ṣaṣṭho rasatvāt sottaro bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.118a-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4266: ṣaṣṭho raso rasāntaravānityukte prathamādirasena siddhasādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4276: na ca(nu) viṣāṇaṃ nāma mahattve satyudbhūtarūpa(ḥ) śarīrāvayavaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4289: anumānatvaṃ yadi kāryatvādau varteta tadā tadaviśiṣṭe vastutvādau(api)
GSP33nysu__1u:4298: tadevaṃ jagatkāraṇatvasya (ṇasya) śāstraikasamadhigamyatvānnānumānādinā lakṣaṇasyātivyāptikathanaṃ yuktamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4304: pūvarsūtre jagatkāraṇatvena pratītaṃ sārvajñaṃ brahmaṇo vedakāraṇatvena sphuṭīkriyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4306: kathaṃ cānantapadārthātmakasya prapañcasya kartṛtvena na sphuṭaṃ tadekadeśavedakāraṇatvena sphuṭībhaviṣyati sārvajñam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4307: atha jagatkāraṇatvaṃ pradhānādivyudāsena brahmaṇyeva sādhayituṃ hetutvenoktaṃ sārvajñaṃ śāstrayonitvena sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4311: tarhi jagatkāraṇatvameva tena kiṃ na sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4313: jagatkāraṇatvena savarjñatvaṃ na siddhayati vedākartṛtvādityāśaṅkayedamuktamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4316: viyadadhikaraṇādau sāpi nirākariṣyata iti cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4318: kiñca vedakartṛtvābhāve(na) sārvajñyaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkaiva nirdalā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4321: yo yāvadarthapratipādakasya vākyasya praṇetā sa tato 'pyadhikamarthaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:4324: ayaṃ cāśeṣārthapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇetātaḥ kathaṃ na sarvatra iti cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4338: kiñca vede jñānakaraṇatvaśaktirbrahmaṇi ca tatkartṛtvaśaktiriti kiṃ kena saṅgatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4348: tathāpi śāstrata evānyeṣāṃ harahiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ ca jagatkāraṇatvapratīterativyāpakamidaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4351: yadyapi nāmāni sarvāṇītyādiśrutyā śivādināmnāṃ viṣṇau śaktimātramavasīyate
GSP33nysu__1u:4353: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti hi nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4362: upakramādaya evānvīyante śaktitātparyagocareṇa sambaddhayante tathā jñāyanta iti yāvat vākyānyetaiḥ ityanvayanāmānaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4368: yatrāpi pratīvyākhyāne na vyabhicaratastatrāpyupakramādyanusandhānapūrvakatvenaiva na tu svataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:4373: mukhyārtho bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśāstrasya nāparaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.119b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4377: tasya ca pravicārita ityadhyāhṛtakriyayā sambandho darśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4378: nanu ca pratītivyākhyānavadupakramādīnāmapi kvacittātparyavyabhicāradarśanātkathaṃ liṅgatvamityāśaṅkānirāsāya samyak pravicārita ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4379: upakramādīnāṃ śrutyādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāṃ sāvakāśatvādinā ca balābalaviniścayapuraḥsaraṃ virodhe balavatā durbalabādhayā vākyārthavimarśaḥ samyak pravicāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4395: anvayādupakramādiliṅgasamudāyāt śāstre samyak pravicārite sati sarvaśāstrasya bhagavatyeva samyagvacanavṛttyānvayācchaktitātparyalakṣaṇasambandhāvagamāttadviṣṇvākhyaṃ brahmaiva jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena śāstrayoni na tu harahiraṇyagarbhādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4397: tatra ca śāstraṃ pramāṇīkriyamāṇaṃ vacanavṛttyā sarvameva ca yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4403: nanu janmādyasya yata iti yacchabdaśravaṇāttadbrahmeti prakṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4408: naca tasya tadityanuktau anvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4417: saṃśabdena sakalapadānāṃ lakṣaṇayā brahmaprātipadikārthamātraparatvamucyata iti vyākhyānamakhaṇḍārthanirāsena nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4419: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇapadavākyātmakāśeṣaśāstrapratipādyaṃ nārāyaṇākhyaṃ brahmaiveti susthaṃ lakṣaṇamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4428: “yato vāco nivartante'”aśabdamasparśam'; ityādiśruteḥ,”śabdo na yatra purukārakavān'; ityādismṛteśca brahma avācyamavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4433: aupaniṣadatvaṃ (tu) ca lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā sambhavanna vācyatāmapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4435: apara āha na sarvaśāstrapratipādyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścayopāyābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4438: “anantā vai vedāḥ'; iti śruteranantaṃ hi śāstramavagamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4442: naca vastuni vikalpaḥ sambhavati iti atrāpi sandehaḥ samāskandati, ityato na sarvaśāstraprāmāṇyājjagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ samastaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahma siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4448: na cāvivakṣitārthaṃ śabdamātraṃ brahmaṇo vācyatve heturbhavitumarhatīti tadartho 'nenopalakṣyate
GSP33nysu__1u:4450: sambandhaśca na kartṛtvādirūpaḥ śrutyananugamāt vipakṣe bādhakābhā(vācca)vaprasaṅgācca
GSP33nysu__1u:4453: tasmādīkṣaṇakarmatvameva hetutayā vivakṣitam ityāśayenoktam- īkṣaṇīyatvata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4457: na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdo yasya tadaśabdam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4459: vācyamiti vaktavye nāvācyamiti vacanaṃ”dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:4471: vācyamiti tu pratijñāte parapakṣapratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4477: īkṣaṇīyatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ”sa etasmājjīvadhanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate'”ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet'; ityādiśrutisiddhamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4490: tathāca prakārāntarābhāve sati yadi brahma vācyamapi na bhavettadekṣaṇīyamapi na bhavediti bādhakaṃ sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4493: yat yatkārakāviṣayaḥ tat tatkriyāviṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhārādyaviṣayo gaganaṃ na chidāviṣaya iti sāmānyavyāptisambhavācca /
GSP33nysu__1u:4494: nanu mābhūtpramāṇābhāsaiḥ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ caikṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ, mā ca bhūdvācyam, tathāpi śabdalakṣyatayekṣaṇīyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati, tathāca vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādaprayojako hetuḥ, ityata āha- na ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4497: hi yasmādanyathā vācyatvābhāve lakṣyatvaṃ kvāpi na dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4499: kenacicchabdena vācyameva hi tīrādikaṃ kenacillakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4502: tataśca vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādaprayojako 'yaṃ prasaṅgahetuḥ, ityata āha-
GSP33nysu__1u:4506: yadyavācyamapi brahma lakṣyamityaṅgīkriyate, tadā kiṃ taditi
GSP33nysu__1u:4509: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4513: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
GSP33nysu__1u:4514: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4519: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe
GSP33nysu__1u:4520: kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4521: tenāpi cenna vācyaṃ kintu lakṣyameva tarhi punaḥ kiṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttatvācchabdāntarameva vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4524: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4527: tasmādvipakṣe 'navasthālakṣaṇabādhakasadbhāvādavācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi yukto 'tiprasaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4528: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4532: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
GSP33nysu__1u:4533: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4538: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe
GSP33nysu__1u:4539: kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:5712: tadevartaṃ tadusatyamāhustadeva brahma paramaṃ kavīnāmiti śrutistasya viṣṇorṛtatvādikaṃ kathamañjasā kavīnāṃ saṃmatyā āha /
GSP33nysu__1u:5716: tatra śrutidvayabalāddvayorapi ṛtādiśabdavācyatve kvāsti virodha ityata
GSP33nysu__1u:5725: evaṃ tarhi viṣṇoreva brahmaśabda iti kvāsti sautrasya hetorvyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:5726: na hi pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkayata iti /

GSP33nysu__1u:5728: janmādimattvameva teṣāṃ kuto 'vagamyata ityata āha- eka iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5729: eko nārāyaṇa āsīnna brahmā naca śaṅkaraḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:5731: nendrasūryau naca guho na somo na vināyakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:5741: svarūpamātreṇāvasthāne 'pi śarīrādilābhalakṣaṇotpattiḥ kiṃ na syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:5744: nanu yadi brahmaśabdo viṣṇoreva tadā jīvādau vyavahāro na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:5745: tathāca brahmatvāpekṣayā napuṃsakaprayoga iti na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:5749: nanu yadyamukhyatayā brahmaśabdasya viṣṇoranyatra vṛttiraṅgīkṛtā tarhyannamayādayo 'pyamukhyabrahmatayā kuto na vyākhyāsyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:5750: na hyatra mukhyabrahmatvajñāpakaṃ kiñcidastītyata āha- prastāva iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5752: atra hi brahmavidāpnoti paramiti parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prastāvaḥ prasaṅgo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__1u:5756: vastutastu śaktigrahaṇasāmarthyena prathamaprāptatvāt bādhakābhāvācca nāmukhyārthakalpanā yuktetyāha- mukhyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5757: mukhyabrahmagrahe yukte nāmukhyaṃ yujyate kvacit // MAnuv_1,1.175cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:5760: mukhyāsambhava evāmukhyāṅgīkāra iti vyāpterityāha- asambhave hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5761: yadvā kathaṃ tarhi brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādau brahmaśabdasyāmukhyārthagrahaṇamityata āha- kvacidasambhave hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5762: nanu nānnamayādayaḥ paramātmā vikāravācino mayaṭśabdasya śravaṇāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:5768: tata eva prastāvasyāpyavavādādityāśaṅkaya tatparihārāya sūtram- oṃ vikāraśabdānneti cenna prācuryāditi oṃ //
GSP33nysu__1u:5778: mayaṭśabdo hi vikāra iva prācurye 'pi mukhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:5782: ato niravakāśabrahmaśabdabalātsāvakāśasya mayaṭaḥ prācuryārthatvopapatterna tadbalādannamayādīnāmaparamātmatvaṃ kalpyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:5785: pareṇāpi hi prāṇamaye na vikārārthatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:5792: svayameva hi śrutiḥ”adyate 'tti ca bhūtāni tasmādannaṃ taducyate';
GSP33nysu__1u:5794: adidhātoḥ karmaṇi kartari ca ktapratyaye sati rūpametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:5796: tasmādannaśabdo 'yaṃ bhāvapradhāno bhūtādyatvaṃ bhūtāttṛtvaṃ ca vakti /
GSP33nysu__1u:5798: bhūtāttṛtvasya saṃhartṛtvena sambhave 'pi bhūtādyatvasya kathamapyasambhavādityata āha- bhogyatvamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:5813: anyathānnapracuro makhaḥ prakāśapracuraḥ savitetyukte makhe savitari ca durbhikṣāndhakāraleśaprasaṅgāt
GSP33nysu__1u:5821: mahāprāṇo mahāvyāpāra iti prāṇamayaśabdenoktārtho bhavediti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:5823: atrāpi ityartho manomayaśabdasya vijñānamayaśabdasya bhavediti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:5826: tathā vijñānaṃ pracuramasminnānandaḥ pracuro 'sminniti vijñānādīnāṃ parameśvarasya ca bhedaprasaṅgena vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādiśrutivirodhaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:5828: tathā manaḥśabdasyāvabodhārthatve manovijñānaśabdayorekārthatvena vijñānamayo manomaya iti pṛthaguktirnopapadyata ityata āha- viśeṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5834: evaṃ jñānarūpasya jñānānandādyātmakasyāpi harerviśeṣaśaktayaiva vibhāgatastadvattvenoktiryujyate evaṃ manaḥśabdasyāvabodhārthatve 'pi
GSP33nysu__1u:5835: (vijñānaṃ) vijñānamaya iti manomaya ityapi vibhāgataḥ pṛthaguktiryujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:5864: yaduktaṃ prāgekasyāpi vibhāgata uktiriti na tatropapattirabhihitā /
GSP33nysu__1u:5870: kiñcottarasminnanuvāke varuṇo bhṛgoretasminnanuvāke pratipāditameva vastu brahmatvenopadiśati
GSP33nysu__1u:5875: tathā ca brahmaśabdāduttarānuvākasaṃvādāccānnamayādīnāṃ pañcānāmapi brahmatve siddhe mayaṭpratyayādīnāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:5882: naca bhīmaseno bhīmo balabhadro balaḥ satyabhāmā satyā punarnavā navā,
GSP33nysu__1u:5891: kiṃ tvatrānnamayādayaḥ kośāstatra tu brahmetyata āha- prāpyatveneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5896: yathā hi jyotiṣyomādhikāre vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeteti kālaviśeṣavidhipare vākye jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣyomasyābhidhāyakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:5900: ata eva na pratyekaṃ vācakatvaṃ kiṃ tvadhikārabalādekadeśotkītarne samagraśabdalakṣaṇāmaṅgīkṛtya nimittābhidheyaikyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam evamatrāpyannaprāṇādyekadeśotkīrtanenānnamayaśabdādilakṣaṇayānnādiśabdānāmannamayādiśabdānāṃ caikyamaṅgīkṛtya tannimittābhidheyaikyamabhyupeyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:5905: tathā cātaḥ prāpyatvena mayaṭproktisāmarthyādannamityādīnāṃ ca śabdānāmaviśeṣeṇa svarūpakyaina kāraṇena taiḥ śabdaiḥ pracurānnādiśabdaiḥ pracurānnādinimittavānparamātmaivocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:5911: idānīmānandamayaśabdasya viṣṇuvācitvaṃ tadgatasya mayaṭasya prācuryārthatvaṃ hetvantareṇopapādayat taddhetuvyapadeśācceti sūtraṃ vyākhyāti- mahānandatva eveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5914: mahānandatva evāsya hetuḥ ko 'nyāditi sphuṭam // MAnuv_1,1.183cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:5916: ānandāmayaprakaraṇe ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyādyadeva ākāśa ānando na syādityasya viṣṇoreva mahānandatva eva (ca) heturuktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:5917: tena jñāyate viṣṇurevānandamayaśabdārtha iti mayaṭ ca prācuryārtha iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:5922: anena (sūtre) taditi ṣaṣṭhayantaṃ saptamyantaṃ ca tantreṇopāttamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:5924: nanvatrākāśasyānandatvābhāve 'nanaṃ prāṇanaṃ ca kasyāpi na syādityetāvaducyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:5925: na tu viṣṇormahānandatve kaścidapi heturucyata ityata uktam- sphuṭamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5928: tathāca viṣṇoranānandatve jagato niśceṣṭatvaprasaṅgamāṇadayantyā śrutyā jagacceṣyakatvaṃ hetutvena vivakṣitamiti vivakṣustasyānandatvena vyāptiṃ tāvadupapādayati- śrutyantara iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:5933: yadā vai sukhaṃ labhate 'tha karoti nāsukhaṃ labdhvā karoti sukhameva labdhvā karotīti
GSP33nysu__1u:5937: ... bhūmā sukhaṃ nālpe sukhaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.184cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:5939: yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamastīti chandogaśrutau sukhaśabdasya pūrṇānanda eva mukhyavṛttirityuktamityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:5942: tathāpi bhāvabhavitroraikyādbhūmeti pūrṇa evocyate nālpa ityuktatvāt sa ca sannidhānātsukheneti gamyate /

GSP33nysu__1u:5961: sukharāgāttatprāptyarthā bhojanādau pravṛttirduḥkhadveṣācca tannivṛttyarthā kaṇṭakoddharaṇādau pravṛttiḥ suprasiddheti nodāhṛtā /
GSP33nysu__1u:5965: tataśca duḥkhodrekanimittā tannivṛttyarthā sukhāvāptyarthā ceti pravṛttitrayaṃ parameśvare nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:5973: ataḥ pravartako 'yaṃ kevalalīlayā pūrṇānandena yukto bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:5977: kāryānuguṇattvācca kāraṇasya mahāpravṛttyā mahānanda eva siddhayatīti /

GSP33nysu__1u:5983: na ko 'pi laukikīṃ vaidikīṃ vā pravṛttiṃ kuryāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:5985: annamayādīnāṃ pañcānāmapi yuktayantareṇa parabrahmatvaṃ pratipādayituṃ sūtram /
GSP33nysu__1u:5993: satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahmeti mantravarṇapratipāditameva vastūttareṇa granthena gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:5999: kathaṃ ca māntravarṇikātharprapañcanārthamuttaro grantha ityataḥ sūtrārthaṃ vivaritumupodghātamāha- brahmaviditi //
GSP33nysu__1u:6003: tadeva ca mantravarṇena satyaṃ jñānamanantavadantavanna bhavatīti lakṣitamasādhāraṇadharmopetatayā pratipāditamato māntravarṇikaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:6006: na hi lakṣaṇena vinā vastu samastavyāvṛttatayā śakyate jñātum /
GSP33nysu__1u:6007: kathaṃ ca tadvedanaṃ kiṃ pratīyamānākārasyāropitatvamupetya tadevāsmītyutānyathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:6016: tatra satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahmeti lakṣaṇaśaṅkāyā uttaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:6019: ata eva samuditaṃ lakṣaṇamabhyupetya viśeṣaṇakṛtyānveṣaṇe pareṣāṃ kleśaḥ parāstaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:6028: tathāpi kiṃ prakṛta ityataḥ sūtrārthaṃ vivṛṇoti- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__1u:6030: uktaṃ jñānaṃ tu manasā vijñānenāpyudīritam // MAnuv_1,1.188 //
GSP33nysu__1u:6032: tatra lakṣaṇeṣu satyatvaṃ sṛṣṭayā”tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ'; iti sṛṣṭiprakaraṇena,”sa vā eṣa puruṣo 'nnarasamayaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:6043: ata uttareṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāmapi prakaraṇānāṃ māntravarṇikaparabrahmalakṣaṇavivṛtitvāt (paraṃ) brahmaivānnamayādaya iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:6046: sadbhāvaṃ yāpayed yasmāt satyaṃ tat tena kathyate // MAnuv_1,1.189cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:6049: sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sadityetatprayujyata iti vacanāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:6052: tathāca sacchabde janmavācīti karmaṇyupapade yāterantarṇītaṇyarthādato 'nupasarge ka iti kapratyaye kṛte 'yasmayādīni chandasītyupapadasya bhasaṃjñāyāṃ satyamiti bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:6053: tataḥ satsadbhāvaṃ janma yāpayetprāpayetsvavyatiriktaṃ sarvaṃ yasmāttasmāttadbrahma satyaṃ kathyata iti sakalajagajjanmakāraṇatvaṃ satyaśabdārthaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā ātmana ākāśa ityādiśrutyehānuvāke sṛṣṭiḥ proktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:6055: tathāpyātmana ākāśa ityādisṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ tadvayākhyānamiti na yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:6059: satyaśabdena yajjagatsadbhāvayāpakaṃ brahmetyuktaṃ tasyārthasya sthāpanāyaiva sṛṣṭiḥ proktā nāvayavārthakathanādyarthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:6063: prakṛte ca satyaṃ brahmeti lakṣaṇe 'bhihite 'sambhavīdaṃ pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāmeva jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādityāśaṅkaya mahābhūtānāmapi brahmaiva kāraṇaṃ tadantargataṃ tatsattādipradaṃ cāto brahmaiva jagajjanakamiti tatsthāpanamātmana ākāśa ityādinā kriyata iti bhavatīdaṃ tadvayākhyānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:6064: annamayaprakaraṇaṃ satyaśabdārtha ityuktaṃ tatkathamityata āha- sattvamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:6066: viśīrṇatā ca sattvaṃ syāt sannamityāhureva yat // MAnuv_1,1.191ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:6067: na kevalaṃ janmaiva sacchabdārthaḥ kintu jīvanaṃ ca prāṇadhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sattvameva sacchabdapravṛttinimittameva
GSP33nysu__1u:6073: evaśabdaḥ ṣadḷviśaraṇagatyavasādaneṣviti pāṭhānmukhya evāyaṃ prayoga iti sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:6074: tathācāsteḥ śatrantasya sadeḥ kvibantasya vā saditi rūpam /
GSP33nysu__1u:6076: sat sattvaṃ jīvanaṃ viśaraṇaṃ vā bhūtānāṃ yāpayatīti satyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:6085: prāṇaṃ devā anuprāṇanti manuṣyāḥ paśavaśca ye /
GSP33nysu__1u:6086: āyuḥ prāṇo hi bhūtānāmiti yad gatijīvane // MAnuv_1,1.192 //
GSP33nysu__1u:6089: devādayaḥ prāṇaṃ paramātmānamanu tatpreraṇayā prāṇanti ceṣyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:6090: sa prāṇaḥ paramātmā sarveṣāmāyurjīvanahetuścāto 'sau prāṇa ucyata iti
GSP33nysu__1u:6091: mantreṇa prāṇanti jīvanti vā sarvabhūtānyaneneti prāṇaśabdārthatayā gatijīvane bhūtānāṃ gatijīvanapradattamiti yāvat ukte /
GSP33nysu__1u:6092: yadyasmāt yataśca saditi dhātvartho, gatirjīvanaṃ cāsti dhātvarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:6093: tābhyāṃ ca śatari kvipi ca kṛte saditi bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:6094: tacca bhāvapradhānaṃ vivakṣitvā satsattvaṃ gatiṃ jīvanaṃ vā bhūtānāṃ yāpayatīti satyaśabdo 'pi gatijīvanapradatvamāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:6101: tataśca tasmādbhāve 'sunpratyaye vihite mana iti jñānamiti caikārthatā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:6105: kintu sakalapadārthasāmānyaviśeṣākāraviṣayamityato nātivyāptirityābhyāṃ prakaraṇābhyāṃ lakṣaṇasyātivyāptiparihārāya prapañcanaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:6109: anantatvaṃ sunirṇītaṃ pūrṇānando hi nālpake // MAnuv_1,1.194 //
GSP33nysu__1u:6115: nālpe sukhamastīti śrutyuktayā hi yasmādalpake 'ntavati pūrṇānando nāstīti niścīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:6128: evamānandamayo 'bhyāsādityādisūtraiḥ svapakṣasādhanaṃ vidhāya parapakṣapratikṣepārthaṃ sūtram- netaro 'nupapattiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:6133: itaro jīvo vā śarīrādikośo vā prakṛtirvātrānnamayādiprakaraṇe na kathyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:6142: puruṣaṃ vetti yo mucyennānyaḥ panthā hi vidyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:6143: iti śruteranyavedī kathaṃ muktiṃ prayāsyati // MAnuv_1,1.196 //
GSP33nysu__1u:6145: nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate'; iti śrutiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:6148: sahasraśīrṣā puruṣa ityādau prakṛtapuruṣasya tamiti parāmarśādityabhipretyoktam- puruṣamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:6155: nanvastu puruṣajñānādeva mokṣaḥ puruṣo 'pyanyaścetkathaṃ nānyajñānānmokṣa ityata āha- puruṣa iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:6156: puruṣaḥ para ātmājo brahma nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:6157: mahānānanda ud viṣṇurbharga oma itīryate // MAnuv_1,1.197 //
GSP33nysu__1u:6158: svayaṃ nārāyaṇo devo nānyasyaitāni kasyacit // MAnuv_1,1.198ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:6161: kuta eteṣāṃ viṣṇunāmatvādeva hi ye viṣṇumuddiśya yajñadānādi kurvate te oṃmityudāhṛtyaiva
GSP33nysu__1u:6163: na hyanyoddeśena kamar kurvāṇairanyaviṣayo mantro japyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:6167: ya enaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ yajanti te pauruṣeṇa sūktena yajanti /

GSP33nysu__1u:8179: sthāṇukarmaṇā hi śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogavibhāgotpattyanupapattau karmāntarameva tadanuguṇaṃ śyene kalpanīyaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:8187: kiñca yo yenanāvinābhūtaḥ sa kvacidupalabhyamāno 'nupayogāttaṃ na gamayatītyalaukikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8188: dvitīye tu kathaṃ na sthāṇau karmānumānam /

GSP33nysu__1u:8253: jīveśvarapakṣe tu chatrinyāyenopacāro bhaviṣyatītyevaṃ prāpte paramātmānamekameva pratipādayatīdaṃ vākyaṃ, guhānihitāliṅgatvāt brahmaśabdena viśeṣaṇācceti siddhāntitam /

GSP33nysu__1u:8562: vidyete ca nañaḥ prayogāprayogau ityato vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:8612: kathaṃ pṛthaktavānyonyābhāvasvarūpabhedānāṃ bhedāṅgīkāre kalpanāgauravādikamityata āha- pṛthaktaveti
GSP33nysu__1u:8616: bhedaḥ svarūpabhedo ghaṭātpṛthak ghaṭo na bhavati paṭa eveti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8617: pṛthaktavānyonyābhāvasvarūpabhedāḥ sarvairlaukikairvaidikaiśca paryāyeṇaiva krameṇaiva pṛthagvākyatayā vyavahriyante, na jātu ekavākyaniveśena /
GSP33nysu__1u:8619: yathā ghaṭakalaśakumbhavyavahārāṇāṃ paryāyatvāt ekenaiva nimittenopapattau ghaṭatvādyanekanimittakalpane kalpanāgauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8620: yathā ca ghaṭādivyavahārān paryāyeṇaiva kurvāṇaistannimittamekatayaiva dṛṣṭamiti, tattritvāṅgīkāre dṛṣṭahāniradṛṣṭakalpanā ca bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8621: tathā pṛthaga(ktava)ādivyavahārāṇāmapi paryāyatvāt ekenaiva svarūpabhedenopapattau, nimittatrayakalpane kalpanāgauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8622: niyamenāsahaprayoktṛbhiḥ pṛthaktavādīnāmaikyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti, tatparityāgena tritvakalpanāyāṃ dṛṣṭahāniradṛṣṭakalpanā ca syāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:8624: mā bhūdghaṭātpṛthagityuktavā ghaṭo na bhavatīti prayogaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8625: ghaṭo na bhavatītyuktavā ghaṭātpṛthagiti kasmānna bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:8626: pṛthaktave sati anyonyābhāvādikaṃ niyataṃ na tvanyonyābhāve pṛthaktavamiti pareṇaiva vyutpāditatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:8645: anyathā bhinno ghaṭātpaṭo 'rthāntaraṃ ghaṭātpaṭa ityādau pañcamī na syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:8664: atha kathañcidapādānatvaṃ tatra vyutpādayiṣyata iti cet /

GSP33nysu__1u:8670: na viśiṣṭādikaṃ pṛthaktavamiti ca svayameva vyutpāditam /

GSP33nysu__1u:8730: kadācid dṛṣṭe 'pi vastuni tadadarśanamityādikaṃ na syāditi, tṛtīyasya prāguktameva parihāraṃ smārayati- bhāveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8735: tathāpi dharmadharmyādivyavahāraprasiddhaye vastuno dharmiṇo viśeṣā eva saṅgrāhyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8743: atraike, guṇakriyādīnāṃ dravyeṇātyantabhedaṃ samavāyaṃ cāṅgīkṛtya vyavahārānupapādayantaḥ śrutīnāmupāsanārthatvaṃ anāgantukārthatvaṃ vā,
GSP33nysu__1u:8746: kevarabhedapratiṣedhaṃ ca śrutīnāmarthaṃ bruvāṇā na viśeṣamicchanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8747: anye tu, akhaṇḍameva brahmābhyupagamya dharmadharmyādivyavahārāḥ sarve
GSP33nysu__1u:8749: tatra bhedavādinā bhedābhedavādinā ca viśeṣamaṅgīkārayati- yatheti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8752: sthāneṣu svaśāstrapradeśeṣu ekaḥ samavāya iti vastuni bhedābhedāviti ca vyavahartṛbhiryathā te samavāyabhedābhedā viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantoṅgīkāryāstathā bhāvābhāvasvarūpāśceti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8756: tatra samavāyasyaikatvaṃ kiṃ tato bhinnamuta tatsvarūpam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8764: tathāca kiṃ brahmaṇi śrutīnāmanyaparatvaṃ prakalpya bhedasamavāyakalpanayā
GSP33nysu__1u:8767: tathāpi samavāyasyeti ṣaṣṭhayarthasya pṛthagabhāvena tatra viśeṣasyāṅgīkāryatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8768: yastu bhedavādī samavāye 'pyekatvasaṅkhayāmaṅgīkaroti, tenāpi samavāyasya sambandho 'ṅgīkriyate, na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8769: ādye kiṃ sa eva, samavāyāntaraṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8777: na hyavayavāvayavyādīnāṃ sambandho 'sti yata ekaḥ samavāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8786: kiñca bhedābhedayorapi vastunā parasparaṃ ca bhedābhedāntarābhyupagame
GSP33nysu__1u:8794: tataśca tannirvāhārthamavaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīye viśeṣe tata eva brahmaṇi sarvasyopapattau kiṃ bhedābhedābhyupagameneti
GSP33nysu__1u:8802: vyāvṛtte nirviśeṣe tu kiṃ vyāvartyabahutvataḥ // MAnuv_1,2.25b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:8805: anena pūrvoktārthasmaraṇārthatvādasya na punaruktidoṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8812: nanu brahmātirikte satyajñānānandādau vācakatvaśaktimatāṃ satyādipadānāṃ lakṣyameva brahmābhyupagamyate
GSP33nysu__1u:8821: tathāpyekena padena lakṣitasyaivānyenāpi lakṣaṇāyāṃ vyathartā na parihartuṃ śakyā /

GSP33nysu__1u:8825: tadevaṃ viśeṣasya sarvavādibhiraṅgīkāyartvāttadbalena dharmadharmyādivyavahāropapatteryuktam adṛśyatvādiguṇānāṃ brahmaṇaikyamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:8839: ata eva padadvayānte nibandhanamiti jñāpayituṃ pādadvayārthaṃ

GSP33nysu__1u:8859: anena śabdādibhya iti sūtrasya tātparyamuktaṃ veditavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8867: // iti śrīmatpūrṇapramatibhagavatpādasukṛteranuvyākhyānasya praguṇajayatīrthākhyayatinā kṛtāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ viṣamapadavākyārthavivṛtau dvitīyaḥ pādo 'yaṃ prathamaviṣaye paryavasitaḥ // iti śrīmannyāyasudhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // //
GSP33nysu__1u:8873: hariḥ sūtrakāraḥ atra pāde liṅgānāṃ nāmnāṃ ca svasminvṛttiṃ vakti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8874: nanu pūrveṇa pādadvayenoktā setyata uktam- punariti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8875: nanu tarhi vaiyarthyamityata uktaṃ tatra harau, anyatra ca tasmāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:8883: kintu mukhyataḥ parameśvare anyatra tvamukhyetyuktam- mukhyata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8884: evaṃ satyanyatra lakṣaṇādikameva prāptamityata uktam- viśeṣāditi //
GSP33nysu__1u:8887: ye śabdāḥ lokadṛṣṭayā anyatra śaktimantaḥ teṣāṃ vedavākyeṣvanyaparatve prāpte śaktitātparyābhyāṃ bhagavadekaniṣṭhatvaṃ pādadvayena pratipāditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8888: atra tūbhayatra śaktimattayā lokaprasiddhānāmanyatra tātparye prāpte,
GSP33nysu__1u:8895: pratipādya, pūrvapakṣiṇā śaṅkitānāṃ rudrādīnāṃ nirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtritam oṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:8902: “akartari ca kārake'; iti jñāpakādasāmarthye 'pi kvacitsamāso bhavatīti vā'”arthābhāve yadavyayam'; ityavyayībhāvo veti samādhānamavadhātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8903: athavā tebhyaḥ śivādibhyo 'nyat atad brahma tasya, śabdo
GSP33nysu__1u:8913: athavā anyatrāpi siddhāntasādhakasyaiva pūrvapakṣanirāse 'pi hetutvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8914: tena na nyūnatādoṣa ityetatpradarśayituṃ siddhāntasādhakasyaiva pūrvapakṣanirāse 'pi vyāpāraṃ darśayitumidaṃ sūtradvayamityanenocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8972: nacaikaparimāṇopetamevotkṛṣṭāpekṣayāṇu mahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ cetyucyata ityāśrayaṇena virodhaparihāraḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:8979: tatra tāvatprathamapakṣamabhyupetya caśabdasūcitaṃ parihāramāha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8985: viruddhavatuuktobhayavidhaviruddhārthapratipādakamiva, bhātaṃupratītamapi vākyaṃ tattvato vyākhyāya harau yojanīyam yojayituṃ śakyamiti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8986: yato 'mbarāntadhṛtyādinākṣarasya viṣṇutvaṃ niścitamato viruddhavadbhātamapi vākyaṃ tattvato vyākhyāya harau yojayitavyamiti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9001: yadi caikaṃ tairyutaṃ kathaṃ tarhi tāni viruddhāni syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9008: na punarvirodhamabhyupetyaikatrāvasthānamucyate yena vyāghātaḥ syāt ityavadhāraṇārthasya caśabdasyātharḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:9019: kiñcākāśasya paramāṇusaṃyogaḥ kimākāśaikadeśe vartate, utākāśa eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:9048: tathāca bhāvābhāvayoranyatra sarvatra sahānavasthitaṃ kathaṃ virodho na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9050: tasmādanyatra sarvatra sahānavasthitaṃ kathaṃ nāma sahāvatiṣṭhata ityevaṃ praśnamātramavaśiṣyate
GSP33nysu__1u:9051: tatra vastusvabhāva eva tādṛśa iti parihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9054: evaṃ sati vākyavyavasthā na kvāpyāśrayaṇīyeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:9058: idānīṃ sthūlatvādinivṛttiparatve 'pi na dāṣa ityevaṃparatayā sūtraṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:9063: tatsvabhāvabhūtāni yāni sthaulyādīni jaḍāni paratantrāṇi kāryāṇi vināśavantyaṇutvādibhiḥ sahānavasthitāni ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:9068: niḥsvabhāvatvamevārthaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha- sarvadharmeti //

GSP33nysu__1u:9071: atra parameśvarasya sasvabhāvatve na kevalamatra kiṃ nāma pūrvoktāṇutvamahāttvādau cetyarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:9076: ataḥparāṇi sūtrāṇi bhāṣya eva spaṣṭārthānīti na tatra vaktavyamasti /

GSP33nysu__1u:9096: ata eva pūrvaṃ dṛśyanta ityuktvātra pradarśitā ityuktam /

GSP33nysu__1u:9107: viṣayāḥ pūrvapakṣanyāyāḥ siddhāntanyāyāścātra dvādaśaivoktāḥ na ca viṣayādinā vinādhikaraṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:9115: anyathā tatrāpi samanvayasambandhānveṣaṇena śiṣyāṇāṃ vṛthā prayāsaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:9173: evamavāntaraphalasya paramaprayojanasya ca padādeḥ prāptatvena vidherasambhavājjaiminivacanācca devānāmanadhikāra iti prāpte tatpratividhānārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33nysu__1u:9174: oṃ bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo 'sti hīti oṃ //

GSP33nysu__1u:9178: tatra yatpūrvapakṣiṇodāhṛtaṃ jaiminivacanaṃ tasya parihāro nāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9189: nanu kiṃ tadanyaphalaṃ kathaṃ ca sarvajñānāmasiddho 'tharḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:9196: nanu sarvajñānāṃ sarvaṃ na prakāśata iti vipratiṣiddham /

GSP33nysu__1u:9240: ayaṃ nyāyo 'nyatrāpyanusandheya iti jñāpayitumityādaya itrata jaiminyādyā iti sadbhiriti coktamiti
GSP33nysu__1u:9248: anyatraiva prasiddhaśabdasamanvayapratipādanaṃ pādārtha iti bhāṣyātpariśeṣādvā siddham /

GSP33nysu__1u:9251: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca |

GSP33nysu__1u:9268: hetunā duḥkhī,baddhaḥ,avaraḥ, ityādyā api śabdā brahmaṇi vartanta ityaṅgīkṛtam /

GSP33nysu__1u:9286: kiñca”prātipadikāddhātvarthaḥ'; iti ṇyantebhyaḥ pacādyaci vihite sulabhaivāvarādiśabdapravṛttiḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:9291: avyaktāditi pañcamyā hi puruṣagataṃ paratvaṃ prati avyaktasyāvadhitvamastītyetāvadeva labhyate
GSP33nysu__1u:9292: naca”tadasyāsti'; ityanena samavāya eva prāpnotīti niyamo 'sti /

GSP33nysu__1u:9302: ata eva”tadasyāstyasminniti matub'; itītikaraṇo vivikṣitārtho nibaddhaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:9306: bhṛtyasamavetasya parājayasya rājādhīnatvena yathā rājñi parājayaḥ parājayanimittakaḥ parājayītiśabdo vartate parājayī bhadrasena iti tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9307: kiñca svāmyasambandhena matubarthāpravṛttau gomāndevadatta ityādikamapi na syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:9312: tasmādduḥkhyādiśabdā api uktārthāpattibalāttadadhīnatvahetuto brahmaṇi vartanta iti sambandhaḥ

GSP33nysu__1u:9328: svadhāmopaviṣye rājñi jayaḥ kutaḥ, na kuto 'pi yataḥ, ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9329: jayasya rājagatatvābhāvātsvātantryamapi yadi śabdapravṛttinimittaṃ na syāt tadā nimittābhāvādrājñi jayiśabdapravṛttirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9342: svātantryābhāsamātreṇa rājñi vijayiśabdo yāvatprayujyate tāvajjayādhikaraṇasyāpi bhṛtyasya sambandhitayā na prayujyate yasmāttasmātsvātantryaṃ tatra mukhyaṃ syāditi sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9343: svātantryāditi vaktavye svātantryābhāsamātrata iti vacanaṃ kimutānupacaritasvātantrye paramātmanīti kaimutyadyotanārtham /
GSP33nysu__1u:9354: tathāpi”jagadvācitvāt'; iti sūtradiśā śiṣyaireva jñātuṃ śakyata ityasiddhirevoktā /

GSP33nysu__1u:9408: bhṛtyadvāraiva rājā vijayate parājayate ceti prasiddhatayā saṃśayānutpādāt

GSP33nysu__1u:9428: naca teṣāṃ prayogo dṛśyata iti sphuṭatvānnoktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9429: tadevaṃ svātantryasya śabdapravṛttihetutvaṃ mukhyatvaṃ ca siddhamityāha-
GSP33nysu__1u:9432: yataḥ pūjyeṣu svāmiṣu jayiprabhṛtayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:9434: yataśca pūjyeṣveva viśeṣeṇa prācuryeṇa prayujyante na bhṛtyeṣu /
GSP33nysu__1u:9435: tena niścīyate svātantryaṃ śabdapravṛttau tadgatatvādapi mukhyaṃ kāraṇamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9440: yataḥ svātantryaṃ kāraṇaṃ mukhyaṃ cātaḥ svātantryārthamabhipretya duḥkhibaddhāvarādyā doṣaśabdā api viṣṇavi viṣṇau”jīvā eva tu duḥkhinaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:9442: satyapi nimitte yathā rājā baddha ityādiprayogābhāvastathā viṣṇurduḥkhītyādiprayogābhāvo 'pi kuto na bhavet atrāpi pākṣikasya viṣṇuvaiṣṇavabhayasya pratibandhakatvasambhavādityata uktam- doṣeti //

GSP33nysu__1u:11405: mandā bhavati dṛṣṭiryayā sā mandadṛṣṭistayā māyayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:11416: yad brahma vivartavādinā kathyate, tasya dūṣaṇaṃ kathyata, ityāvṛttyā yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:11419: sā mandadṛṣṭistasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ tato 'nyagā // MAnuv_1,4.82ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:11424: mandadṛṣṭāvāśrayānirūpaṇādinā nirākṛtāyāṃ sarvamidaṃ nirākṛtaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:11428: māyāvādino hi kecit brahmaiva svāvidyayā jagadākāreṇa vivartate svapnādivaditi manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:11431: māyāvidyāpratibimbitaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇam, viruddhaṃ ca brahmābhūtatvālambanaṃ jīvāścāvidyānubaddhā ityanye /
GSP33nysu__1u:11432: jīvā eva svāvidyayā pratyekaṃ prapañcākāreṇa brahma vibhrāmyanti,
GSP33nysu__1u:11436: iha jīvagetyanuktvā tato 'nyageti vadatā sa jīvaḥ kiṃ brahmaṇo 'nyo('nanyo
GSP33nysu__1u:11437: vā) na vā ityapi vikalpaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:11438: tatra dvitīyaḥ prathame praviśatīti taṃ dūṣayati- brahmaṇaścediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:11440: yadi brahmaṇo vi(śva)bhramastadā bhramasya viśeṣājñānapūrvakatvāttadapi brahmaṇo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyam
GSP33nysu__1u:11442: yadi ca na brahmaṇi sārvajñyaṃ, tarhi kva tatsyāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:11461: nādehayogino dṛṣṭiriti tat kāraṇaṃ svataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.83ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:11465: kintu dehayogarahitasyendriyābhāvātatpadārthadarśanaṃ na sambhavatītyato hetoḥ āropakāraṇamindriyaṃ tadāśrayo dehaśca kalpanāṃ vinaivāstītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:11466: nahi sukhādivadrajatādivadvāsya prapañcasya sākṣimātrasiddhatvaṃ paro manyate dehendriyāṇāmapyutpattimatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:11468: astu brahmavyatiriktānāṃ jīvānāṃ sakāraṇānāṃ tadīyadehendriyāṇāṃ cābhrāntikalpitatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:11469: draṣṭṛtvena darśanakaraṇatvena tadāśrayatvena tatkāraṇatvena ca bhrānteḥ pūrvabhāvitvāt /
