GSP33nysu__1u:11485: na kevalaṃ prapañcaḥ, kintu jīvabrahmaṇorbhedo 'pi yadi bhramajo bhramasiddhaḥ aṅgīkriyate
GSP33nysu__1u:11496: jīvabrahma(ṇoḥ)bhedo yayā bhrāntyā siddhaḥ, sā tāvadajñānāpekṣā /

GSP33nysu__1u:11539: bhramaśabdaḥ jñāne arthe ca pareṣāṃ prasiddha iti bhramatva ityuktam /

GSP33nysu__1u:11543: nanu sarvo 'pyayaṃ prapañco bhrāntisiddho 'pi vyāvahāriko bhavatyeva /

GSP33nysu__1u:11548: syādapyevaṃ yadi prapañcasya vyāvahārikatā tāvat (tava) śakyāṅgīkārā syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:11580: nanu kathaṃ bādarāyaṇasya na mṛṣā svapna ityata āha- vāsaneti //

GSP33nysu__1u:11590: na māyāmātrapadena svapnasya mṛṣātvamabhimatam, kintu vāsanājanitatvam,

GSP33nysu__1u:11612: nanu ca rajjau sarpabhrame, asatyasyāpi sarpasya sarpocitabhayakampādyarthakriyākāritvaṃ dṛśyate, tathā sarpe samāropitāyāḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:11613: kusumamālāyāḥ santoṣakāritā upalabhyate, ato vyāptibhaṅgastarkasyetyata āha- sarpeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:11615: “nā bhūdatra sarpaḥ'; itivat”na sarpajñānamabhūt'; iti bādhakānudayāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:11621: satyapi sarpādau asati ca jñāne, bhayakampādyanutpatteḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:11651: kiñca vilakṣaṇasamāgrījanmanorjñānayoryathā parokṣatvāparokṣatvarūpo viśeṣaḥ viṣayopādhinā vinābhyupagamyate, evamaparokṣajñāne 'pi kathaṃ svagato viśeṣo nāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:11652: api ca sarpajñānasya vilakṣaṇārthakriyā na svagatenātiśayena vinopapadyate
GSP33nysu__1u:11654: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyasarpajñāne samīcīnayā sāmagṣā jātaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:11656: ato viṣayāntarbhāvamantareṇa svagatenaiva viśeṣeṇa sarpādijñānasya bhayādijanakatvānna sarpasya kiñcitkaratvamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:11657: tadevaṃ yatrātharkriyā niścitā na tatra mithyātvam, yatra tu mithyātvaṃ na tatrārthakriyeti na tarkamūlavyāpteḥ kvāpi bhaṅgaḥ, ityupasaṃharati-

GSP33nysu__1u:11661: naca jñānasya satyasyārthakriyokteti vācyam, tasyāpi prapañcāntarbhāvena vipratipannatvādityata āha- brahma tviti //

GSP33nysu__1u:11666: nanu mayāṅgīkriyamāṇaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyākāritvaṃ ca na svābhāvikam /

GSP33nysu__1u:11676: brahmaṇo'rthakriyākāritvaṃ parata ityasya nāyamarthaḥ dāruyantrasyeva parādhīnam iti, nāpi kulālasyeva prayojanādyapekṣamiti; kintu gagane malinateva niṣkriyā eva brahmaṇi māyāsambandhādarthakriyā(di) avabhāsata iti /

GSP33nysu__1u:11696: paratastve ca prāmāṇyasyānavasthāpātena na pramā niścīyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:11697: santi”niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyam'; ityādiśrutayo bādhikā iti cet /

GSP33nysu__1u:11844: evaṃ tarhi tathābhūtamākāśādikamevāśritya”iha pakṣī'; ityādipratyayaḥ kuto na samarthanīyaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:11856: śabdo hi śrotreṇa prāpto vā gṛhyate 'prāpto vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:11859: sā hi na tāvacchrotrasya gamanena sambhavati /

GSP33nysu__1u:11907: śrotrasya cakṣuṣa iva gatvāgrāhitve śabde diksaṃśayo na syāditi cet /

GSP33nysu__1u:11963: abhāvasya sādhyatvādabhāvābhāvasya ca bhāvatvena pratiyogyanapekṣatayā vyāptigrahaṇasambhavānna doṣa iti cenna /

GSP33nysu__1u:11978: pratītasyāpi śuktirajatādeḥ bādhadarśanāt, ityata āha- sākṣisiddhasyeti //

GSP33nysu__1u:11995: sākṣiṇa eva hi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrāhakatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:11996: yadvā gaganādisvarūpaṃ sākṣisiddham, tasya traikālikābādhyatvaṃ tu
GSP33nysu__1u:12001: yena sarvakāleṣvabādhyatvaṃ sākṣiṇā pratīyata ityata āha- kālo hīti //

GSP33nysu__1u:12008: kālaḥ bāhyapratyakṣādyatiriktapramāṇavedyaḥ, asatsvapi teṣu pratīyamānatvāt, yadyasminniti pratīyate tattato 'riktapramāṇavedyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12016: utthitasya kiṃ sākṣiṇātītakālānubhavamabhyupagamya sukhaparāmarśo nirākriyate uta pramāṇāntareṇa
GSP33nysu__1u:12017: ādye siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam, pareṇāpi kālasya sākṣivedyatayā aṅgīkṛtatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12021: atītānāgatakālayostu sākṣivedyatvābhāvātkathaṃ traikālikābādhyabhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā prapañcasya siddhayatītyata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12039: tadetaditi sarvaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ vā smṛtigocaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:12040: sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ hyeva vartate // MAnuv_1,4.97 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12041: tasmānna taṃ vinā kiñcit smartuṃ draṣṭumathāpi vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12043: yasmāttaditi smṛtigocarametaditi dṛśyaṃ vā sarvamapi sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ sambaddhameva vartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12044: tasmāttaṃ kālaṃ vinā kālapratibhāsaṃ vinā kiñcidvayāptyādikaṃ smartuṃ vā dharmyādikaṃ draṣṭumiti vā na śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12047: vyāpyadharmasyānubhavāt smaraṇādvā prāganubhūtāṃ vyāptiṃ smṛtavato vyāptasya pakṣe 'nusandhānamanumānam
GSP33nysu__1u:12052: na punā rūpamityeva tattā ca pūrvakālasambandhitaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12054: anumānādijanyo 'pyabhūditi vā bhavatīti vā bhaviṣyatīti vodeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12059: tathāca vyāptyādiviṣayā api pratītayo na kālāviśiṣṭaṃ svārthaṃ gocacayituṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12063: tasya kālasya nityasiddhervyāptyādigrahaṇa eva sākṣiṇā siddhatvānna kālānumānasyāvasaro bhavet aniścite hyarthe nyāsyāvasaraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12064: niścitaviṣayaṃ tu siddhasādhanatvāt pareṣāmāśrayāsiddham asmākaṃ tvasaṅgatamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12065: evaṃ kālaviṣayāṇi sarvānumānāni sāmānyato nirākṛtya viśeṣato nirākaroti-
GSP33nysu__1u:12073: tathā yugapadāgatau ayugapadāgatau cireṇāgataḥ kṣipramāgataḥ iti pratyayāḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:12090: tathāca liṅgapratītāveva liṅginaḥ kālasya sphuraṇātkathaṃ tena tadanumānam
GSP33nysu__1u:12098: atha balīpalitakārkaśyādinā kālasambandhe 'numite, vipratipannaṃ prati parāparādipratyayānāṃ kāryatvena nimittānumānamidaṃ bhāṣyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12100: śarīrāvasthayā hi tasya kālasambandho 'numīyate, yatkiñciddravyasambandho vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12102: ādye tannityasiddhestasya kālasya prāganumānānnityena sākṣiṇā siddheḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12104: kiñca valīpalitā(kārkaśya)diśarīrāvasthā kāraṇatvena kālānumāne tannityasiddhestasya kālasambandhasya nityaṃ sarvadā valīpalitādivaidhuryadaśāyāmapi siddhernitye paramāṇāvapi siddherbādhitaviṣayatvena nānumānāvasaro bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12107: bahutvaṃ hi kālasya kiṃ paramāṇūnāmiva sahaiva, uta kriyāṇāmiva pūrvāparabhā(vitve)vena
GSP33nysu__1u:12109: tatsambandhasyāpi nityasiddheḥ netaraḥ (nottaraḥ) tasya kālasya nityasiddheḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12128: ataḥ piṇḍatapanaparispandayoḥ saṃyuktasaṃyogisamavāyātmani paramparāsambandhe yaddravyaṃ nimittaṃ sa kāla iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12139: tadidamuktam teṣāṃ viśiṣṭapratyayānāṃ nityasiddherdravyāntarakalpānāṃ vinā svabhāvādeva siddheḥ dravyāntarānumānāvasaro na bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12151: kiñcābhāvasyāpi na bhūtalasānnidhyaṃ parapakṣe kimapi paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12152: astu vā tapanaparispandānāṃ piṇḍaṃ pratyupanāyakaṃ dravyāntaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:12156: naca taraṇipiṇḍāntakāle tāni na santyanupalambhāditi vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12165: sūryagatyupanāyakatvaṃ ca dravyasvarūpaṃ vā atīndriyaśaktirvā sahakāriśaktirvā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12170: tṛtīye('pi) kiṃ tadvayāpakatvaṃ vā, viśeṣaguṇaviraho veti va(vive)ktavyam
GSP33nysu__1u:12179: yadyākāśaṃ(ḥ) svasambandhenānyagataṃ dharmam anyatra saṅkrāmayet, tadā sarvaṃ sarvatra saṅkrāmayet aviśeṣāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:12186: kimayaṃ svarasambandhanibandhanaḥ kiṃ vā atiriktasambandhādhīna iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12187: dvitīye 'pi kiṃ sākṣātsambandho 'tra nimittamuta dravyāntarakṛta iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12189: sarvatra bādhakāni paryālocayanprasiddhadravyeṣu yadbādhakaṃ paśyettadaprasiddhe 'pi kalpyamāne kathaṃ nānusandadhyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12190: anusandadhānaśca tatsvābhāvyena parihāraṃ cintayankalpanāgauravavyasanamapahāya laghīyāṃsameva pakṣaṃ na kathaṃ(vā)
GSP33nysu__1u:12198: astu vā'kāśasya viśeṣaguṇavataḥ kriyopanāyakatvābhāvaḥ diśastu syāt viśeṣaguṇaśūnyatvāt vyāpakatvācca
GSP33nysu__1u:12204: tasya viśiṣṭapratyayasya nityena niyatena prasiddhenaiva pṛthivyādinā siddhernāprasiddhe dravye 'numānāvasaro bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12205: anye tu paramparaśabdābhyāṃ paratvāparatve guṇau yuvasthavirapiṇḍa(vartinau)gatau ācakṣate
GSP33nysu__1u:12206: tau asamavāyikāraṇasaṃyogāśrayatayā nimittakāraṇāpekṣābuddhisampādakatayā vā kālamanumāpayata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12208: kiñca parāparādipratyayānāṃ sūryagatayo vā parā(tvā)paratve vā yadyālambanaṃ tadā astu kālānumānam
GSP33nysu__1u:12212: paro 'yamityādi prayuktavantaḥ ko 'syārtha iti pṛṣṭāḥ laukikāḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:12215: tadbahutvādi ca kvacitsākṣiṇā kvacidanumānādinā ca jñāyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12220: vivādādhyāsitaṃ kāryaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ janyate kāryatvāt antaḥkaraṇadvayasaṃyogavaditi
GSP33nysu__1u:12225: na cāntaḥkaraṇadvayasaṃyoge pramāṇamasti, mano manasā saṃyujyate
GSP33nysu__1u:12243: astu kālasya diśaśca bahutvam, ātmavadupasaṅgrāhakaikyena dravyāṇāṃ navatvopapattiriti cettarhi diśā kālena vā sādhyaparyavasānā(sambhavā)dubhayasādhakatvamasya na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12250: na vidyate doṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya jñānasya tena pratītasya viṣayīkṛtasyādoṣeṇa pratyakṣādinā vā pratītasya gaganādeḥ prapañcasya satyatvaṃ traikālikābādhyatvaṃ sākṣiṇā mataṃ siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:12255: jñānaṃ ca bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ sattvenaivāvagāhate, nāsattvena,
GSP33nysu__1u:12257: nacaivaṃ ghaṭo 'sti ghaṭo nāstītipratyayānupapattiḥ paunaruktyādvayāghātācceti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12262: jñānagataṃ ca yāthārthyalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ jñānagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12264: tathāca sākṣiṇā jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇatā tadviṣayasya sakalaprapañcasya traikālikābādhyatvalakṣaṇaṃ satyatvameva gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12265: yadi hi jñānagocarasya nityasya vā anityasya vā sarvagatasya vā asarvagatasya vā arthasya
GSP33nysu__1u:12266: bādhaḥ syāt, ko 'rthastadā jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ sākṣiṇā pramitamityasyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12267: yadi tarhi jñānasvarūpagrāhakaḥ sākṣī tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇanprapañcasatyatāṃ niścinuyāt, śuktirajatādijñānasvarūpagrāhako 'pi sa eveti tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇan śuktirajatādikamapi satyaṃ vyavasthāpayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12268: naca śuktirajatādijñānānāṃ prāmāṇyameva nāsti, kiṃ sākṣiṇā gṛhyatām iti
GSP33nysu__1u:12269: yuktam, prapañcagocarāṇāmapi jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyābhāvātkiṃ sākṣirā gṛhyata ityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:12270: tasmātsākṣiṇā prapañcasatyatāsiddhimabhilaṣatā jñānagrāhakasya sākṣiṇaḥ prāmāṇyagrāhakatvaṃ svabhāva iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12275: yadā tvarthitvena prāmāṇyaṃ nirdidhārayiṣitaṃ tadā sajātīyavijātīyasaṃvādavisaṃvādabhāvābhāvalakṣaṇayā parīkṣayā doṣabhāvaṃ niścitya prāmāṇyamavadhārayati doṣadaśarne tvaprāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12285: nanu yadi parīkṣāsahakṛtaḥsākṣī jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tadānavasthā syāt
GSP33nysu__1u:12290: paraprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasamārthyamiti tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāya parīkṣāntarāpekṣā grāhakāntarāpekṣā cetyanavasthaivetyata āha-
GSP33nysu__1u:12292: parīkṣādeśca satyatvaṃ tena hyeva mataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.99cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12296: tena sākṣiṇaiva kevalena na tu parīkṣāyuktena(sahakṛtena) /
GSP33nysu__1u:12303: evañca yatra yatra doṣasambhāvanayā tatsandehastatra tatraiva parīkṣāpekṣā nānyatra /
GSP33nysu__1u:12308: astyatra purataḥ pānīyamiti vākyaṃ śrutavato bhavati sandehaḥ kimidaṃ viparyayādimūlamuta neti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12310: tata evārthe sandihānaḥ pratyāsīdan rūpaviśeṣādinānuminoti pānīyametaditi
GSP33nysu__1u:12320: saṃśayābhāve ca na tatpūrvikā parīkṣeti kuto 'navasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12325: indriyaliṅgaśabdajanyeṣu jñāneṣvanādau saṃsāre dvayīṃ gatimanusandadhatsākṣī na sahasaiva pramāṇametaditi niścetuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12329: parīkṣāyāṃ cendriyaliṅgaśabdajāyāṃ pūrvanyāyena parīkṣāntaramanusarati yāvatsākṣātsvaviṣaye sukhādāvavatarati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12331: nahi jñānasvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca viṣayīkartuṃ svamahimnaiva śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12332: tasya tu mānasyā doṣaśaṅkayā prāmāṇyagrahaṇaśaktiḥ pratibaddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12335: parīkṣayā ca pratibandhe 'pagate nijayaiva śaktyā prāmāṇyamavadhārayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12336: nacāsya vyutpādanasyāprāmāṇye 'pi samatvāttasyāpi svato grahaṇamiti vācyam
GSP33nysu__1u:12343: na cāprāmāṇyaṃ kvāpi parīkṣānapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇā niścitacaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:12353: yadi jñānagrāhakātiriktasya yathākathamapi praveśātprāmāṇyasya paratastvamiti matam, tadā sākṣiṇa eva svataḥprāmāṇyamanyasya parata ityaṅgīkāre 'pi na kaścidvirodha iti saṅkṣepaḥ vistarastu svayam(eva)ācāryeṇa vakṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12356: na punarasya kadācitkutrāpi kenāpi svārthavyabhicāro na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃrūpam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12357: tatkathaṃ tenātyantikabādhābhāvalakṣaṇaṃ satyatvaṃ viśvasya siddhayedityata āha- anyatheti
GSP33nysu__1u:12359: akasmād vinivṛttiśca kiṃ viśvasya na śaṅkayate // MAnuv_1,4.100 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12360: sākṣiṇaḥ sarvathā bādhavaidhurvalakṣaṇaprāmāṇyāgrāhakatve viśvasya pūrṇasya brahmaṇo 'pi prapañcavadvinivṛttiḥ kiṃ kasmānna śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12362: nanu ca”satyaṃ jñānam'”tatsatyam'; ityādiśrutyā, brahma na nivṛttimat
GSP33nysu__1u:12371: ādye kathaṃ prapañcaviṣayāṇāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12372: dvitīye brahmaṇaḥ satyatāpratipādakānāṃ śrutyādīnāmapi nātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12375: evaṃca tajjñānamapi na tattvajñānamiti na tadarthaḥ prayatnaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12376: atha kvacicchaktiḥ kvacinneti brūyāttadā niyāmakaṃ vācyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12377: nanu yadi brahma bādhārhaṃ syāttarhīyatā kālena kuto na nivṛttam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12378: tasmāditaḥpūrvaṃ bādharahitatvānnottaratrāpi bādhaḥ śaṅkayata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:12384: itaḥ pūrvaṃ tathābhāvād yadi no saṃsṛtergatiḥ // MAnuv_1,4.101ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12386: yadi brahmaṇo nivṛttinar śaṅkayata iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12402: viśvasya viyadāderuttarakṣaṇa eva nivṛttirvināśaḥ kiṃ na śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12406: ) nanvīśvarecchayaiva śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇāni prapañcapralayaṃ pratipādayanti, viśvavināśo na nirhetuko vināśatvātpaṭanāśavadityanumānamapi /
GSP33nysu__1u:12411: tatkathamuttaratrāpi śaṅkayeta ityata (uktam) āha- itaḥ pūrvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12412: kimatra yatpūrvaṃ nābhūttaduttaratrāpi na bhaviṣyatīti vyāptiḥ, kiṃvā yatpūrvaṃ na nirhetukaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ na taduttaratrāpi tathā vināśavaditi,
GSP33nysu__1u:12413: yadvā yannirhetukaṃ na tadbhaviṣyatīti vyāptiḥ, pūrvoktistu tadupapādanāyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12422: tathācākasmātkimapi na nivartata ityaṅgīkāre no saṃsṛtergatiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12424: evaṃ tarhi prapañco 'pyuttarakṣaṇe (svayameva) nivartiṣyata iti śaṅkā syāt
GSP33nysu__1u:12427: vākyānumāditaścet syāt tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca sākṣitaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.101cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12431: brahmaṇo 'pi nivṛttyāśaṅkāyāmāpāditāyāṃ yadi paro vākyānumādito nivṛttyabhāvaniścayaḥ syāditi brūyāt, yadi vā ākasmikottarakṣaṇe
GSP33nysu__1u:12433: yadi ca vākyānumāditaḥ saṃsāranivṛttiḥ syāditi vadet, tadā tasya vākyādeḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:12435: sākṣītareṇetyaṅgīkāre jñānasya sākṣivedyatvena parataḥ prāmāṇyagrahāpatteḥ sākṣiṇaiveti vaktavyam
GSP33nysu__1u:12437: sākṣī kiṃ brahmasatyatvādipratipādakānāṃ vākyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tātkālikameva gṛhṇāti kiṃvā'tyantikam
GSP33nysu__1u:12445: tasya brahmasatyatvādipratipādakavākyādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ yathā sākṣī vartamānakālīnaṃ sthāpayati gṛhṇāti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12450: na kevalaṃ brahmasatyatvatvādivākyādiprāmāṇyaṃ sākṣī tātkālikaṃ gṛhṇāti kintvātyantikamevetyarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:12455: sarvakāleṣvapīdamevameva na kadāpi viṣayāpahāralakṣaṇaṃ bādhamāpnotīti vyabhicāramapohya tata eva sthairyeṇa gṛhṇātīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12458: ata eva tadviṣayamapi brahmādikaṃ sarvakāleṣvapi sthairyādatiśayena vyabhicāramapohyaiva sthāpayatīti
GSP33nysu__1u:12461: ayaṃ sākṣī yadi tatsatyamityādipramāṇaprāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ gṛhṇan tadviṣayasya brahmādestraikālikābādhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpayettarhi tathaiva viśvaviṣayasyākṣajādijñānasyātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇan tadantargatāṃ viśvasyābādhyatāmapi sthāpaye(deva)t aviśeṣāditi samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12469: viśvaviṣayasyākṣajādestu tātkālikameveti kiṃ na syādityata āha- nirdoṣeti
GSP33nysu__1u:12471: tatsatyamityādijñānasyātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇāti sākṣītyatra kiṃ nimittam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12472: jñānaṃ gṛhṇan tasya nirdoṣatāyāṃ prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇātīti sākṣiṇaḥ svabhāvo 'yamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12473: kathaṃ tarhyakṣajāderapi ātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12475: athavā kiṃ sākṣī kutrāpi prāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ grahītuṃ na śaknoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12504: bahūnāmīśvarasya tatpreritānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ ca jñānecchāprayatnairnimittatve śrutyādipramāṇasadbhāvena tadviruddhatvācceti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12505: kiñcaikajīvājñānaparikalpitaṃ jīvajaḍātmakaṃ samastamiti vadanpraṣṭavyaḥ kimasāveko jīvastvam utānya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12513: yaḥ parasya prativādyādeḥ satyatāṃ jānannapi paro nāstīti vadati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12515: svātmānamiva paramapi satyatayā paśyato 'hameka eva satyo madajñānakalpitāḥ sarve jīvā jaḍāśceti vacanaṃ svānubhavaviruddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12521: tathā cāniścayena na mokṣārthā pravṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:12524: yadi paraḥ prativādyādijīvānna paśyati, paśyanvā na santīti paśyati, tadā kimityunmattavadvavadet
GSP33nysu__1u:12527: anyathonmattavannāyaṃ laukiko nāpi parīkṣaka ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12532: parābhāve ca tadvaiyarthyādvayarthyāṃ vācaṃ na prayuñjīta /
GSP33nysu__1u:12535: mayāpi kimapi nocyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12538: mayā kimapi kadāpi naivocyata iti yadyucyate tadā svakriyāvirodhiśraḥ sakalalokāvagatārthāpalāpinastasya taskarasyaiva daṇḍa evocito na pratyuttaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:12540: tatkiṃ pratīyogyabhāve niścite vyavahārato 'pi vadantaḥ prekṣāvanto bhavanti, yenedamucyeteti
GSP33nysu__1u:12545: tatra tāvatprapañco yadi vidyetetyādivākyadvayaṃ paṭhitvā parābhimate
GSP33nysu__1u:12547: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12550: upadeśādayaṃ vādo 'jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MAnuv_1,4.108 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12551: ityatra yadiśabdau ca nivarteteti ca dvayam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12553: nanvatra sūtragṛhītatayā pareṇopāttānāṃ śrutīnāmanupapattyādikaṃ prathamatā vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12559: ityatra ślokadvaye yadiśabdadvayaṃ nivarteteti liṅprayogadvayaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:12567: yadyatra prapañcamithyātvamabhi(saṃ)dhitsitaṃ syāttadā yo 'yaṃ prapañco vidyata iva dṛśyate sa nivartiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12568: ajñānena kalpito vikalpo vinivartiṣyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12571: yadi parvato niragniko bhavet tarhi nirdhūmo 'pi syāditi yathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12572: prasaṅgasya ca viparyaye paryavasānādanivṛttyādikameva vākyasāmarthyāllabhyata iti parakīyamarthamapākurvataiva śrutitātparyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12588: tathāpyutpavireveti kutaḥ, sattātra kuto netyata āha- utpattireveti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12591: atra hi prapañco yadi vidyeta tarhi nivarteteti yadiśabdādibalātprasaṅgo 'yamiti jñāyate
GSP33nysu__1u:12607: keyaṃ sattā nāmānugatarūpā vā svarūpameva vā nādyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12610: abhāve tadbhāvasyāstyabhāvo 'sti ca dhvaṃsa ityādau vakṣyamāṇatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:12618: ata eva tarkāṅgabhūtamāpādyasyāniṣṭatvaṃ ca nopapadyata ityataḥ prapañcaśabdamanyathā vyācaṣṭe- prapañca iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12623: pañcaśatau varge veti vāśabdena pañcaśabdasyāpi nipātanāṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12634: naca kadāpi padārthānāmanyonyaṃ tādātmyamastītyanityānāmapi bhedo nitya eveti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12642: mithaśca jaḍabhedo yaḥ prapañco bhedapañcakaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.111 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12648: so 'yaṃ satyo hyanādiścetyanena atrāpi pratijñādvayaṃ bahireva kartavyamiti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12654: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tasmādajñānināṃ matam // MAnuv_1,4.112cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12659: māṅ māne traiṅ pālana ityābhyāṃ ghaña'rthe kavidhānamiti karmaṇi kapratyaye mātramiti bhavati
GSP33nysu__1u:12660: dhātudvayādapyekaḥ pratyayaḥ adibhūbhyāṃ ḍutac adbhutamityādau dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12671: iti pūrvaśloke 'nādimāyayā parameśvaraprajñayā tadicchayā vā jīvajātasya prakṛtyādijaḍāvṛtajñānatvalakṣaṇaṃ suptatvaṃ tayaiva parameśvarāditattvaviṣayaparokṣajñānalakṣaṇaṃ prabodhamabhidhāya
GSP33nysu__1u:12674: prabhoricchayā nigaḍādinā puruṣe baddhe mukte vā bheda(traya)darśanāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12675: prāk”prabhavaḥsarvabhāvānām'; iti bhāvaśabdoktānāṃ jīvānāṃ mitho bhedo 'pyuktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12680: tatra tāvadanāditvaṃ vipakṣe bādhakapradarśanenopapādayati- prapañca iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12681: yadi ca jaḍajīvabhedo nivarteta tadā jīvānāṃ jaḍatvāpattyā mokṣaśāstravaiyarthyamityādirūpeṇa nivartetetyasyāniṣṭatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12701: vikalpaḥ prakṛto bhedo yadi kenacidajñānādinā kalpitaḥ syāttarhi candrabhedavannivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:12709: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tu tattve 'jñāte sati bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12711: adhunā pariṇāmavādinā vivartavādinā ca pratijñādṛṣṭā tānuparodhāditi sūtrārthatayā gṛhītām”uta tamādeśamaprākṣa'; ityādikāṃ śrutiṃ vyākhyāti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12712: tatra pariṇāmavādino vyākhyānam”uta tamādeśamaprākṣaḥ, yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam'; itrata jagato brahmapariṇāmatayā
GSP33nysu__1u:12714: tatra sarvasya brahmopādānatāmajānatā upādānopādeyayorapi bhedaṃ manyamānena śvetaketunā anyajñāne satyanyajñānasya kvāpyadarśanāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12715: “kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavati'; iti codite jagato brahmopādānatayā tadananyatvamupadekṣyan laukikapratītisiddhaṃ kāraṇātkāryasyānanyatvaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:12716: tajjñānena tajjñānaṃ ca darśayati-”yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:12719: yathā somyaikena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12720: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ lohamaṇirityeva satyam yathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:12721: somyaikena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12722: vācā'rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ kārṣṇāyasamityeva satyam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12723: yathaikamṛtpiṇḍādipariṇāmānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ tadananyayā tajjñānena jñātateti dṛṣṭāntatrayārthaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:12729: tadvācakānāṃ ca svarūpakāryavyapadeśādibhedātparasparaṃ bhedo vāstava ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12730: etairhetubhiḥ parasparaṃ bhedaścetkāraṇādapi taireva bheda iti pūrvapakṣaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:12733: yatprakāreṇa yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tatprakāreṇaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12736: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya dṛṣṭāntākāṅkṣāyāmucyate- yathā somyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12738: ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12744: mṛttiketyeva satyamityeṣa brahmaṇo dṛṣṭānta āmnāta iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12745: tatraikavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñānaṃ mṛtpiṇḍādidṛṣṭāntāśca vikāravivartābhiprāyā itye(vaṃ)tat na tāvadvākyātpratīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12748: vācārabdhaṃ tu sāṅketyaṃ nāma syād ... // MAnuv_1,4.114ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12750: lyuṭ ca bhāve karaṇādhikaraṇayośca vihito na karmaṇi naca”kṛtyalluṭo
GSP33nysu__1u:12758: “ṭāpaṃ cāpi halantānāṃ yathā vācā niśā diśā'; iti vacanāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:12766: yathā caṣṭe 'neneti cakṣuriti nirvacanalabhyeti darśanakāraṇatve cakṣuṣā paśyatīti noktārthatā
GSP33nysu__1u:12771: anena vikriyata iti vikāra iti karmaṇi ghañityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12774: nityaṃ tu nāmadheyaṃ yanmṛttiketyādi vaidikam // MAnuv_1,4.114cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12778: yanmṛttiketyādi saṃskṛtaṃ nāmadheyam tadeva nityamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12792: yadā tu vācā yasyārambhaṇaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ vikāro janimaditi, vācā nāmnāmārambhaṇaṃ vividhākāraḥ, ākārākāriṇorabhedāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12793: vikāritvādutpattivināśavaditi yāvaditi vā granthāntaroktā yojanā, tadā(tu)
GSP33nysu__1u:12809: tatra yathā prādhānyātsaṃskṛtajñānamātreṇa sāṅketikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:12811: evamanityatvādināpradhānasya devatākarmādimiśrasya sakalasyāpi jagato jñānena yatphalaṃ tatsamastamapi nityatvādinā pradhānasya paramātmano jñānāllabhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12818: pāmarā na hi vidvāniti vadanti, ataḥ sadbhirityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12824: sadātanaṃ satyamiti nirvacanena satyamiti padena nityamucyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12827: sadāśabdāttatra bhava ityarthe”avyayāttyap'; iti tyappratyaye kṛte”sarvasya so 'nyatarasyāṃ diḥ'; ityatra yogavibhāgātsadāśabdasya so
GSP33nysu__1u:12835: tameva prayogaṃ darśayituṃ”yadainaṃ jarāvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato '(syāti)vaśiṣyata iti sa brūyānnāsya jarayaitajjīyarte na vadhenāsya
GSP33nysu__1u:12836: hanyate etatsatyaṃ brahmapuram'; iti vākyamarthataḥ paṭhati- jareti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12839: hanyate na vadhenāyaṃ jarayā ca na jīryati // MAnuv_1,4.117 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12840: etat satyaṃ brahmapuramiti nityatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.118ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12841: yadainaṃ dehaṃ jarāvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vāyaṃ dehaḥ, (tadā)tatastadasya
GSP33nysu__1u:12842: dehasyāntargataḥ paramātmā dahyamānagehāntargatagaganavatkimatiśiṣyate kiṃvā paṭādivannaśyatīti pṛṣṭe, nāsya dehasya jarayāyaṃ paramātmā jīryate,
GSP33nysu__1u:12843: asya vadhena na hanyate, kintvetadbrahma pūrṇatvātpuraṃ satyaṃ nityamiti parihāro 'bhidhīyate
GSP33nysu__1u:12845: atrāpi satyaśabdaḥ kuto nityārtha ityata āha- nityatva eva hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12850: etadeva spaṣṭīkartumetatsatyaṃ brahmapuramityetāvati paṭhitavye pūrvavākyamapi paṭhitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12852: brahmaṇo jarāvadhayorabhāve satyatvaṃ hetutvenocyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:12855: jarādyupetānāṃ dehānāmasatyatvāsyāsiddheḥ asatyānāṃ ca śuktirajatādīnāṃ jarādyabhāvena vyatirekasyāpyabhāvāt
GSP33nysu__1u:12875: kiṃ rūḍhimāśritya vācārambhaṇamityasya mithyeti vyākhyānaṃ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:12883: vācā kevalamārabhyate vikāro na tu vastuvṛttenāstīti vyākhyāne mithyātvaṃ labhyata iti cenna
GSP33nysu__1u:12884: yataḥ śrutyā vācārambhaṇamityevokte kevalaśabdaprakṣepeṇa mithyeti vyākhyāne 'śrutakalpanameveti
GSP33nysu__1u:12891: atha vikāro nāmadheyaṃ ca dvayamapi vācārambhaṇamiti vyākhyānaṃ, tathāpi vikāraśabdenaivābhidheyābhidhānayorgrahaṇasambhavānnāmadhayemiti punaruktireveti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12896: tatra mṛttikaiva satyeti vakta(vyam)vye itiśabdastu nirarthaka eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12900: asmākaṃ tu”śabdādarthe sampratyayaḥ'; iti mṛttikārthe prāpte tatparihāreṇa śabdasvarūpagrahaṇārthaṃ tadupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12901: pariṇāmavādino 'pi kṛdyoge tṛtīyāyā aṅgīkṛtatvāt lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vyākhyātatvādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyamityeteṣāṃ padānāmanvayābhāvena
GSP33nysu__1u:12902: padāntarādhyāhārasyeṣṭatvādaśrutakalpanam, nāmadheyasyāpi vikāragrahaṇena grahaṇasambhavātpunaruktiḥ, itiśabdasya nirarthakatā ceti sphuṭatvānnoktam
GSP33nysu__1u:12907: tatra yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tayaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyamiti vyācakṣāṇena vaktavyam, keyaṃ sattā vivakṣiteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12909: yo hi kāryakāraṇayorbhedaṃ manyate, sa kathaṃ kāraṇasvarūpeṇaiva kāryaṃ svarūpavadityaṅgīkuryāt
GSP33nysu__1u:12913: atha mṛttikāsattādhīnasattākaṃ mṛṇmayamiti vivakṣitamiti, tathāpi kulālādisattādhīnasattākamapi bhavatītyanaikāntyameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:12917: idānīṃ yathā somyetyādīni dṛṣṭāntavākyāni svamatena vyākariṣyanparakīyavyākhyāyāṃ tāvaddoṣamāha- eka iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12918: ekaḥ piṇḍo maṇiśceti padavaiyathyarmeva ca // MAnuv_1,4.119cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12925: jagato brahmavikāratvena tadāropitatvena caikavijñānena sarvavijñāne vivakṣite mṛdā vijñātayā mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12927: kṛṣṇāyasā vijñātena kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syādityetāvatā pūrṇatvāttrayāṇāmekaśabdānāṃ piṇḍamaṇinakhanikṛntanaśabdānāṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ ca vigatāthartvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12933: “laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminnarthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ'; iti hi nyāyavidaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12936: nanvakeneti paramākāraṇasyaikatvaṃ piṇḍeneti kāryābhimukhyaṃ sarvamiti kāryanānātvaṃ vivakṣitam
GSP33nysu__1u:12942: idantu sarvathā nopapadyate, yathā somyaikena nakhanikṛntaneneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12948: yadyatra dṛṣṭāntatraye na vikāravivartavivakṣā kiṃ tarhi vivakṣitamityata
GSP33nysu__1u:12951: vivakṣātra tu nityatve prādhānye coktavartmanā // MAnuv_1,4.121ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12955: nityatvaṃ prādhānyopapādakameva na tu svatantramekavijñānena sarvavijñānasyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12962: nanvasminnapi pakṣe”sadeva somyedamagra āsīt'; ityāderuttaragranthasya saṅgatyabhāvo doṣaḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:12963: asmākaṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāvādiprapañcārthatvena astyupayoga ityata āha-
GSP33nysu__1u:12969: prādhānyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ, tatpratipattyarthaṃ sṛṣṭayādeḥ pratipādaka eva granthavistaraḥ pravṛtto 'taḥ kathamasaṅgatiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12979: tasmāt kenāpi mārgeṇa na vivartamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.122ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12981: brahmāvidyāpekṣayā vā, jīvāvidyāpakṣeṇa vā, ekajīvamatena vā,
GSP33nysu__1u:12982: anekajīvamatena vā, svapakṣasādhanena vā, parapakṣanirāsena vā,
GSP33nysu__1u:12983: yuktiparyālocanayā vā, śrutiparyālocanayā vā, vicāritamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13003: yadi nopādānatayā vibhramādhiṣṭhānatayā vā, brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:13004: kīdṛśaṃ tarhi janmādisūtre 'bhitihamityata āha- tata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13009: vicitrānekakāryakartṛtve śramādidoṣāḥ prasajyanta ityata uktam- aśrama iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13015: evamasminnadhyāye parabrahmaṇi nārāyaṇe pratipāditasya sakalaśrutisamanvayasya phalaṃ janmādisūtroditalakṣaṇasiddhimupasaṃharati-
